心置きなく使うとしよう……

source: Allow a single peiste to cross and I'll see to it you're docked a full moon's salary!
target: 橋を守る、給料のある限り！

source: Next season's catch is safe...for now.
target: ウチのご飯は守られたっ！

source: The coblyns have withdrawn. Return to barracks!
target: 討伐完了、帰還します！
橋にのさばる賊を討ち払え！

source: Ye dinnae get et. <var 08 E905 ((Thank ye.)) ((Will ye be me new da?)) /var>
target: よし、次もいっぱい倒そうな！

source: The children are safe! Now let us fill that hole!
target: 今のうちに穴を埋めるぜッ！

source: I really should be off. I mustn't keep the noble ladies waiting!
target: これで明日も生きられまさぁ！
クリア！　警戒を続けます！

source: Ah, let us marvel in the beauty of the desert! (Just disregard those goat corpses.)
target: 快適な街道の旅を！

source: Crawl back under your rocks, foul lizards!
target: 見たか蛮族、我らの勝利だ！

source: Wine and glory to the victors!
target: 勝った、守りきったぞ！

source: One day this land will be ours again!
target: 遺憾なり……！

source: <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> aren't an imp, are you? Hah hah! I jest!
target: 化けてないな？　帰って点呼だ
不穏の芽は、即刈り取る！

source: The desert is no place for rose...ling.
target: ザナラーンを易く思うな！

source: You haven't seen the last of us!
target: チッ、今は退くぞ

source: Mayhap this will teach those degenerates to piss elsewhere.
target: 戦績よし、命よし！

source: I couldn't have made it on my own. You have our gratitude.
target: よかった、先輩も喜びます

source: Foolish are the sons of man. The past is to be left to slumber.
target: つまらぬ収穫なり
く、屈辱ぅぅ……ッ！

source: Is that all? Might be you left your member at home with your blade.
target: なんだ、もう終わりか？
じゃ、あとは任せたぜ！

source: If you think you can do any better, I invite you to try.
target: 次の相手はお前だな
楽しみだ、こちらへ
では……勝負ッ！

source: Hah! I've felt bigger stings from a flea bite.
target: その程度か！？
腕が鳴るな！
誰でも構わん、来い

source: Spineless cravens is what you all are!
target: 腑抜けばかりか？
うっ、降参だ……

source: But I will see you again! I swear it!
target: まだ鍛錬が足りないな……
時間の無駄だな

source: Is there no one who can offer me a challenge?
target: 戦馬鹿は勝手にやってな！
くそっラットめ、やめろ！

source: Get out of there, you hellssent vermin!
target: オレンジが食われていく……
ヒャッハーー！

source: Pay the toll! Pay the toll!
target: おらおら通行料の徴収だ！

source: Empty yer purse out on the bridge and we'll let ye live long enough to watch us gather up the gil.
target: 金目のものは残らず出しな！

source: The flour! Won't anyone think of the <var 1A 02 /var>flour<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: お願い、早くやっつけて！

source: Why won't these galagos leave the mill be!?
target: 誰かガラゴをやっつけて！
こーこは　とおさなーい！
もちもの　おいてーけ！

source: Pain, you will suffer! Titan knows!
target: あーたると　いーたいよー！
ど～りゃ～！！

source: Titan sees all! Our pain, He knows!
target: 若いもんの　うらみ　はらす！

source: Succumb, you will to the cold of the crag!
target: ぜ～ったいに　まけない！

source: Not the cogs! It took ages for those to arrive!
target: ああっ、大事な資材が！

source: I did naught to deserve this!
target: 早く追い払ってくれぇ
シュコォ……
どんどんこわすぞ～！
てっつ～い
小魚が食い荒らされてるー！？

source: Wretched swamp spawn! I'd club you myself if I had a big enough stick!
target: おのれオロボンっ！　誰かー！
1匹残らず、やっちまえー！
父ちゃんの仇め！

source: You are a plague on the realm!
target: 邪魔だ！

source: Run! Cower behind your stone walls!
target: どけ！

source: We grow weary of your impudence!
target: 脆弱なり！

source: Throw down your arms and you will be spared an eternity of damnation!
target: 奪え！　攫え！
屈服せよ！
ぬんっ！
やっちゃうゾ！
チミ、どこ行くノ？
ほひ～！
ケケッ、ザンネ～ン

source: Slip open yer purse, like. Or I'll cut it for ye.
target: 有り金すべて置いてきな！

source: No coin, ye say? What've ye hidin' in them smallclothes, then?
target: すっ裸にしてやんよォ！

source: We must hurry. It is unwise to pause on the shifting sands.
target: オアシスまで頑張りましょう

source: The Amalj'aa watch from afar. If we are lucky, they will leave us be.
target: アマルジャ族に警戒を

source: Do not let the silence of the sand fool you!
target: 不気味な静けさですね…

source: These relics could reveal the secrets of eras past. They must be cataloged!
target: 荷物を必ず届けなければ

source: I am fortunate to have you by my side.
target: これは重大な任務なんだ…！

source: Babaroon is hungry for some crunchies! Adventurer crunchy?
target: ババルン、まけないっちゃ！

source: Babaroon has a bubbly pot! Throws you in the bubbly pot!
target: 侵入者、ぐつぐつっちゃ！
退けるべし！
おのれ！
愚かなり！
ようやく大人しくなったか……

target: まったく、手間取らせやがって

source: Ignore the grunts! We seek out their leader!
target: 雑兵は捨て置け！

source: There is no sight of the commander. He must be here somewhere!
target: ムムッ、指揮官はどこだ？

source: No matter. We can still sabotage their supplies!
target: ひとまず物資を叩く！

source: He can't have withdrawn already. I <var 1A 02 /var>saw<var 1A 01 /var> him with mine own two eyes!
target: くっ、早く目的を……
何事か！？
指揮官だ、討てッ！

source: For coin and country! We have stayed the lizards' hand!
target: 完遂だ！　走って撤収ゥ！

source: We can only hope our efforts gave the reinforcements enough time...
target: ムムッ、妨害もこれまでか

source: Tally our losses and burn the bodies!
target: 被害を補填せよ！

source: You have my thanks and the thanks of Ul'dah!
target: 恩に着るぞ、いざ突入！

target: 各位魔物を撃退せよ！

target: 何か、食べられる物を……

source: I did it, Mother! Everything will be alright!

source: Is there not a single adventurer who would assist me?
target: 誰か手伝ってくださらない？

target: うふ、じっくり調べてあげる

target: 秩序のため、ゴミを始末する！
了解ッ！
くそッ、銅刃団のやつらだ！

target: まだだ、俺たちは生きる！

source: Gah! You leave me no choice...
target: こんな……はずじゃ……
逃がすな、一網打尽だ！

我々に逃げ道は
ないということね

source: The Corpse Brigade will never perish!
target:
ここで死ぬわけには
いかない……！

target: ひるむな、押し返せ！

target: 襲撃だ！逃げろ、隠れろ！

target: 勘弁してくれ…！
まだ死にたくないぃぃ

早く終われ…早く終われ…

source: And the machine roars to life!
target: 迎え撃つぞ、オレの女神たち！

target: オレがいれば怖くないさ！

target: こらこら、見惚れるなよ

target: いいッ！オレかっこいいッ！

target: うずうず……！

source: I'd take an arrow in the thigh for you, Captain!

target: イイトコ見せるにゃ！

target: 一緒なら無敵にゃ！
みんな、隊長さまを援護にゃ！
おせおせーっ！

source: I'll rip out your eyes and cast them into the chasm!
target: とにゃーッ！

source: You won't get far, northborn scum!
target: チッ、次はないぞ野盗ども！

target:
皆、今日の獲物は、
サンドウォームだ！
おおーっ！！
おー

よし、十分だな
族長もお喜びになられるだろう

target: 命あっての商売さ！

target: 今回も激しかったなー
よかったぁ…！
無事だ、生きてる！！

target: 俺は最初から信じてたぞ

target: このまま敵の拠点を叩く！　オレの美しい背中に続け！

target: こーなったら止まらないにゃ
今が一番かっこいいにゃ

target: オレは隊長失格だ…

source: Let me tend to your wounds.

ん！？森から何か来たぞ…！

ドウ…ゾ…！”
助けにきたわよ！
加勢する！行くぞッ！
諦めるものか！

target:
この気配、奥に何かいるぞ！
やつが黒幕か…！？

target:
なんて美しい勝利だ！

target: 守りきれ！　我々は華麗に勝利するッ！

source: Rip the teeth from their maws!
target: すぐ息の根を止めてやる！

美味そうなやつだね！
叩き潰すっ！
えい
とー
げんきになれー
かっちこちー

みんな無事か！？　あと少し耐えてくれ……！

source: No one will remember your name after I'm through with you!
target: 退けキキルン！　我らの勇姿、その小汚い面には惜しい！

source: Zuzuroon cares not of names. Zuzuroon cares only of sparklies!
target: おまえら商品……帰るなら一緒っちゃ……

source: This is <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> bridge, and it is high time you left it!

target: グウウ……売り払ってやるっちゃ！
はぁ～い♪ お話しない～？

source: Fall back! We are outmatched and need time to regroup!
target:
引き上げるぞ！
これ以上は泥沼だ…！

source: Oh, not <var 1A 02 /var>them<var 1A 01 /var> again. You might want to draw your weapon.

source: Why won't they just let me be!?
target: うそぉ！　またぁ～！？
いや～ん！　こわ～い～！

source: Twelve forfend! They simply won't give in!
target: キャー！　たーすーけーて～！
ちゃりちゃり…
商品あつめるっちゃ…
お客様がお待ちっちゃ…

source: Strong must away. Lizards seek puny stock.

source: Qiqirn no quarrel with sword swingers. Leave now, and Qiqirn see off!

target:
わらわら仕入れたっちゃ…
ちゃりちゃりと、交換…

物の数ではないわ！

source: Twelve forgive me, for I am weak.
target: はぁ、困りました……

source: I will repay you one day, my friend. Just...not with mead.
target: このお礼は、いつか必ず……

source: When we're through, I want to be waist-deep in little white mandragora limbs!
target: これより掃討作戦を開始する！
総員かかれっ！！
行くぞおぉぉっ！！
うわぁ魚が食われちまう～！

source: The hells-spawned thing bit me leg!
target: 誰かプギルを退治してくれ！！

source: Keep it away! Keep it away!
target: う、うわぁっ！

source: I didn't hire you to just stand there!
target: お願い、やっつけてください！
追い払ってください！

source: The mead! You can have it! Just spare me!
target: お酒がこぼれてしまう……
かっ、囲まれました……！

source: Oh, kindly Matron, take me to Your ivory bosom and away from this hell!
target: うう、あと少しなのに……！

source: Where is this <var 1A 02 /var>gift<var 1A 01 /var> Master Gegeruju promised?
target: ワシの可愛い子猫ちゃん……

source: I do not enjoy being made to wait.
target: 早く舞を見せておくれ……

source: Apologies, milord. I hope you did not wait overlong.
target: オジサマ待たせてゴメンね

source: Ah, Master Gegeruju. You know me well.
target: うおーーヨイヨイーー！！
さぁ、こちらへ……

source: There is no need to rush, milord. Thanks to the master, we have <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> night.
target: もぅあわてな・い・のっ♪
ハァ……ハァ……
ボクだけの子猫ちゃん！

source: I won't let none have her!
target: 誰にも……渡すもんか！！
子猫ちゃんはボクだけのモノ！
我らが大業を、邪魔させんぞ！
貴様も生贄として捧げてくれるわ！

愚か者どもめッ！
我らを止められはせんぞッ！
覚悟しやがれっ

source: Off our land, ye foul shite!
target: 邪魔だ、うせろっ！
死守する！

source: How's about some steel fer supper!?
target: これでも食らえ！
うちらの場所だ！
海賊を舐めんな！
……うふふふ♪
悪い子には、お仕置きを♪

source: A knife to the gut'll serve ye fine.
target: ぶった斬って、ぶった斬る♪

source: This'll hurt you more than it does me!
target: 仕方ないわね……♪

source: I'll drag ye down to the abyss meself!
target: まだ死ぬのは早いわよ♪

source: Let me go! I'll pay double what the lizardmen are offering!
target: 売り飛ばされる！
生きて帰れる！ありがとう！
もっと早く助けに来いよぉ…！

source: I thought I'd never see Highbridge again.

source: What in the blary 'ells is that!?
target: おいおいおいおい！

source: Grab yer steel! The mill's under attack!
target: 何だコレ、聞いてねぇぞ！？

source: Keep the damn things off the 'ampers!
target: 食料が狙われてるぞー！！

source: Kobolds! Gut the mecky cave dogs!
target: コボルド族が攻めてきたっ！

source: First rats, then kobolds, now coeurls!? What's next? Aurochs!?
target: 大物のクァールだ！
村が踏みつぶされちまう！

source: No rest fer an honest pirate, eh?
target: くっそ、休みなしかよ！
何なの、まったく！！

source: Wivout that grain, we'll starve like...rats!
target: 貴重な食いもんを！？

source: There be too godsdamned many of 'em!
target: コボルド族……数が多い！

source: Go piss on some other tree!
target: 勝手なマネは許さない！

source: I's killed me share o' rats o'er the years. What's a few more?
target: 私の出番ね……♪

source: The bigger they come, the more there be to kill!
target: 腕が鳴るわ……♪
ぶるぶる、かくれるっちゃ！

source: This stench! It could only be...
target: む、この臭い……まさか……

source: Qiqirn! A whole pack heads this way as we speak!
target: くっキキルンめ、また来たか！

source: To arms, men! We must defend the tower!
target: みんな、追い払ってくれ！！

source: That should keep them at bay for now.
target: ふぅ～やっと帰ったか……

source: But where there are ten rats, there are ten score. They'll be back.
target: 次は、もっと痛めつけてやる
お～し、皆お疲れ～！

source: There'll be more toads to gut tomorrow.

source: Now, let us back to the Wench. The first round is on the Admiral!
target: それでは撤収しますか

source: I can see your hearts just aren't in it.
target: 目標は達成できず、か……

source: Let us back to the Wench. A nice warm ale'll lift your spirits!
target: 帰って立て直しだな……撤収！

source: Killin' ain't no different on land than it be on the sea.
target: 陸の上だって負けねえさ

source: Only pirate what'll give ye quarter's a dead pirate.
target: 海賊の力、思い知ったか！
おとといきやがれ！

source: Burn the bodies. We don't want 'em foulin' the water!
target: よしっ、追い払えた！
見かけ倒しだったな

source: Today we fought! Tonight, we drink!
target: ふん、ざまぁみやがれ！
海賊を甘く見んじゃないよ！

source: Start skinnin' the dead! I need somethin' to wipe me arse!

source: I'll see each an' every one of ye in the seventh hell!

source: If a pirate cannot gut a blary rat, she ain't worth 'er weight in salt.

source: Tell yer Titan I sends me regards!
target: 出直してきな♪

source: Ye'll ne'er see naught as that on the seas, me lads!

source: I should've stayed on the sea.
target: クソッ、めちゃくちゃだ……

source: Failures as pirates, failures as millers, failures as fighters...
target: なんてザマだ……
ちくしょう……
食い物が……

source: They was jus' toyin' wiv us.
target: モグラどもめ……
すっかり荒らされちまった……
みんな……
あぁ……

source: I'll need to seal up this wound afore it festers.
target: もっと力があれば……

source: Damn this place to the seventh hell!
target: ボロボロよ……

source: I've 'ad enough. A pirate needs 'er a ship, not a mecky mill.
target: やっと行ってくれた……

source: A little rust on the sword arm...
target: やだ、腕が鈍ったの……？

source: 'Aven't yet rightened me land legs, I reckon.
target: 海とは勝手が違うわね……

source: Ye've a whole blary mountain to muck about on. Leave us be!
target: ここは渡さない、うふふ……♪

source: O'Ghomoro is ours! All ours! Cast off, overdwellers! Cast off!
target: 山～は　ワレら～のもの！！

source: Yer neck is hanging by a thread, lad.
target: 目ざわり……消えて♪

source: Titan will not suffer you on His mountain! Cast off! Cast off!
target: 消え～るは　オマ～エだ！！
ヒト～は　でて～け！

source: The rocks will crush you! The mountain will shun you!
target: 大地～に　埋めて　や～る
タイタンさ～ま　おたす～け……
では、リトルアラミゴまで頼む

source: Mills is fer millers. Do I look like a mecky miller!?
target: こんな所で、やっていけっか！

source: The Eighth Umbral Era'll be upon us afore this mill's repaired...
target: また復興が遠のいた……
くそったれっ……

source: I'm done. Done wiv it all!
target: こんな場所、うんざり……

source: What I wouldn't give for a breath o' sweet salt air...
target: 復興が振り出しにもどったな
やっぱ海に戻りたい……

source: Now that was a thing o' beauty!
target: いやいや、お見事です……

source: Tell me, how did it feel to whack them beasties good?
target: ありがとうございました

source: Oh, if only I were still young.
target: これで被害も減ります

source: Hells, I <var 1A 02 /var>am<var 1A 01 /var> still young! Might be next time I join ye!
target: また助けてください！
逃げられちゃいましたね……

source: 'Tis a shame we couldn't thwack 'em all.
target: とはいえご協力に感謝します

source: But they'll be back, and I'll be waitin'.
target: でも、すぐ奴らが来るでしょう

source: Waitin' fer <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> to help again, that is. Gah hah hah hah!
target: また助けてください

source: Now it may be I can fish 'ere in peace, like.
target: よかった、これで一安心だ

source: Me leg? It'll be fine. I'll just dip 'er in the river a spell.
target: ありがとう、みなさん！！
うわああああああ！！！

source:
<pant> <pant>
Our tribe was tested today, yet our strength proven once again.
target:
はぁ……はぁ……
ウ族の名を穢させはしない！

source: You will have vengeance, my fallen sisters... I swear it!
target: くっ……畜生共め……！！

source: Another hole lost to the bloody hells-spawn.
target: あぁぁ、もうダメだぁ……

source: The guildmaster won't like that one bit...
target: 漁師ギルドに報告しなきゃ

source: Wild beasts have made these fields their home.
target: これより、魔物を討伐する！

source: Now we reclaim what is rightfully ours!
target: 総員、攻撃開始！！
今日もがんばるぞーっと……
ん？　なんだ、あいつら……？
海賊だ、総員、食い止めろ！
やつらサハギン族の手下だっ！
よし、任務完了！

source: But we must remain vigilant. The stubborn beasts will likely come crawling back.
target: 帰還する、皆ご苦労だった！
くそっ、作戦失敗か……

source: I won't let that happen again.
target: 撤退して態勢を立て直すぞ！
うぇへへへ……
ひぃやっはぁ～っ！！
フヒヒ……
ふしゅるるる……
あはあはあはあはあは……
水神様のために！
ちっ、こいつら手ごわい！
退け、退け

source: Their eyes... Did you see their eyes?
target: ふん、二度と来るな！

source: Aye... Those men are dead, and they don't even know it.
target: 無事、追い払えた……

source: I fear I cannot make it alone...
target: 困った、護衛が足りない……

source: I pray the local levy has seen to the Westroad.
target: 何事もなければよいが……

source: I don't remember Tidegate being so far...
target: 南防波壁は、まだか……
急ぎましょう

source: I shall not disappoint the Admiral again!
target: 障害は排除するっ！

source: Back to the hills with you!
target: 必ずや届けてみせるっ！

source: The Maelstrom thanks you. Till sea swallows all!
target: ご協力、感謝します！
ナルザル様、俺に加護を……

source: Do not stray too far from me now. I fear this ankle won't hold much longer.
target: 離れるなよ、絶対だぞ？

source: You don't see any more creatures do you? And lemons. What of lemons?
target: 気付かれないといいが

source: Ack! This is it! The end! Thal, take me!
target: ひっ、死ぬぅ！？
膝が、膝がぁ！

source: Now to soak this ankle in a piping hot tub...
target: 助かった、お前も無事でな

source: A fine day for fishin', if I do say so meself.
target: 息子のために頑張っちゃうぞ～

source: I'll catch somethin' big today. I can <var 1A 02 /var>feel<var 1A 01 /var> it.
target: 今日は大漁の予感！

source: What's that? Somethin's odd with the water...
target: おや？　川の様子が……
エ、エフトだーーー！！！
誰かー、エフトを倒してくれー

source: When I said I might catch somethin' big, I never meant <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> big!
target: 息子が楽しみにしてるんだよ～

source: How am I to fish with all these damned efts about!?
target: ボウズで帰ったら怒られる！

source: I can't fish in that water, what with all them rotting eft corpses...
target: 一度、出直すかぁ……

source: Might be I need to find me another hole...
target: すっかり食い荒らされて……
なんて日だ！

source: What a bloody fine day for fishin'!
target: 今日はいったいなんて日だ！！

source: We shall crush our enemies and revel in their fear as they tremble before us!
target: 敵陣を陥落すべし！
ゆけ、我がしもべたちよ！

source: Dare you defy me!? I said <var 1A 02 /var>forward<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: どうした、敵陣へと進まぬか！

source: Another lash will teach you to obey!
target: しつけが足りぬか……

source: The drakes, they would set us at naught!
target: やつら聞いておらぬぞ
仇敵を滅すべし！
我の命を聞け！

source: Commander! The drake... It <var 1A 02 /var>relieves<var 1A 01 /var> itself on our supplies!
target: そこ、小便をするでない！
邪魔者なるか……！
火を吐くのだ！

source: Rise, I say! Rise and attack!
target: 威勢が足りぬ！

source: Attack, or I'll kill you myself!
target: 命を聞けと言っておろう！

source: Our Lord will not be pleased...
target: くっ、傲慢なり……

source: There! Do you not see the enemy!?
target: 敵だ、わからぬか！？

source: Commander! These drakes! They fail us!
target: ええい、扱いづらし！

source: These would serve better as meat for our men!
target: 餌が欲しくば功を立てよ！
失策なり、退却せよ

source: This is futile. Fall back to Zanr'ak!
target: ままならぬ、一時帰還すべし

source: The Westroad's not safe this far from Limsa.
target: 近頃は、この辺も危険でしてね

source: With all this danger lurking in the shadows, how do people even survive out here?
target: ほう、海賊の被害が増えてると
おひとりにはできませんよ

source: Ah hah hah hah hah! Yellowjacket humor, no doubt.
target: ははは、心配症ですなぁ
……杞憂ならいいんですがね
いくぞッ！
帝国に歯向かうか！
駆逐する！
貴様らごとき！

source: How ever will I pass with those...those...<var 1A 02 /var>things<var 1A 01 /var> standing there!
target: くそ、仕事の約束があるのに！
これじゃあ、通れないよ……
ありがとう、冒険者さん！

source: Do I wait, or do I brave the hills...?
target: まいったね、通れないよ……

source: Don't make me have to brave the hills!
target: 商売の邪魔してくれちゃって！
ありがと、助かったわ！

source: Pshkoooh! Who is it that backstalks Wormwix!?
target:
シュコォ……シュコォ……
なんぞ　なんぞ　追っ手かい～

source: Deathwords bring slimy beasties for bumlicking!
target:
ねとねと　呼び出す
オイラの僕～

source: Deathwords bring fiery beasties for bumburning!
target:
めらめら　呼び出す
オイラの僕～

source: Deathwords bring buzzing beasties for bumbiting!
target:
ぶんぶん　呼び出す
オイラの僕～

source: Wormwix is thinking about maybe making busydeal with wideheart adventurer...
target:
シュコォ……シュコォ……
僕も打ち止め　負けそうだ～

source: Bastard of Light! Bow down to the one true god! Bow to Dalamud!
target:
ダラガブ神の前に
ひれ伏すがいい！

source: The souls of the Lambs never sleep!
target:
眠れる我が同胞よ、
死の淵から甦れ！

source: The souls of the Lambs never forgive!
target:
眠れる同胞よ、
我が力となれ！

source: The souls of the Lambs never forget!
target:
死を振り払い、
来たれ、我が同胞よ！

source: Brothers! Sisters! Take me to your arms! Do not leave me here!
target:
同胞たちよ……
我を見捨てるのか……

source: I answer only to the Lord of the Inferno!
target: すべては焔神の為に……

清き炎が全てを
焼き付くさん！

source: Your soul is rotten! Let the flames purify the corruption!
target:
不浄なる者を滅せよ！
清浄なる炎よ！

燃え盛れ！
炎獄の火炎よ！！

我が魂の炎が……
燃え尽きるというのか？

source: Your souls cannot be saved until they have burned in the seventh hell!
target:
穢れた貴方の魂を、
死によって浄化しましょう！

source: Rise, my brother, and walk at my side once again!
target:
嗚呼、頼もしきかな！
私の死せる弟よ！

source: Rise, my sister, and reclaim what was wrested from your grasp!
target:
嗚呼、逞しきかな！
私の死せる友よ！

source: Rise, my father, and strike down our enemies with rage!
target:
嗚呼、強きかな！
私の死せる父よ！

source: My kin... Soon...we shall be reunited once...again...
target:
皆、死んでいった……
そして私も……

source: This one's wings shall darken the moon and bring everlasting night!
target:
あちしの大っきな羽、
美しいでふっち？

あちしのお友達は
とっても強いのでふっち！

source: This one tires of the game!
target:
羽が大きくなったあちしは
負けないのでふっち！

source: Death to the spoken! Death to all!
target:
あちしを邪魔する冒険者、
死んでしまえでふっち！

ああ、羽が……
あちしの羽が……

source: You were foolish to come here alone!
target:
見せてもらおうか、
冒険者の力とやらを……
私の勝ちだな……

source: Do not think you have won just yet!
target: そうそう消えるものではない！
やるな、冒険者……！

source: You have not seen the last of me!
target: まだだ、まだ消えんよ！

ぼくー つよーい
返り討ちーに してやーる

おまーえ 錬金術ーで
こんなーの つくれーるか？

source: Know, I do, the secrets of the Land!
target: おつぎーは コレーだぞ！

source: Hewn, we are, from rock! To dust it is we crumble! So sayeth Titan!
target:
とっておきーの
つよーい やつだーぞ！

source: O Lord of Crags! The pain! The pain...!
target:
……タイタンさーま、
たすーけて……たす……

source: Come! The one true god awaits your sacrifice!
target:
真なる神を
知らぬ愚か者どもめ！

source: O Dalamud! Baptize these wayward souls in thy crimson radiance!
target:
ダラガブ神よ、
その紅き力を我にッ！

source: Let the blood red flames burn away your sins!
target:
紅蓮の炎よ、
我が敵を焼き尽くせ！

source: Tonight, the blood price shall be paid in full!
target:
至高の神ダラガブよ！
血の代価を今ここにッ！

source: My lord... Why hast thou forsaken...me...?
target:
……我が神よ……
私をお見捨てになるのか？

source: None can stand the searing heat of my flames!
target:
気炎万丈！
我が炎に敵はなし！

source: Try and match my speed, pathetic smoothskin!
target:
電光石火！
速攻にて先手を取らん！

source: You have not seen the limits of my power!
target:
雲煙過眼！
次なる手を打たん！

source: The land will melt and the seas will boil!
target:
怒髪衝天！
奥の手を使わん！

驚天動地……
我が炎が破れるのか？

source: Zezeroon's heart is filled with sadness. Supper is there, but Zezeroon's here!
target:
ゼゼルン、宴に、
行きたいっちゃ！

source: Zezeroon's belly is filled with rumblings and grumblings!
target:
なんだか、とっても、
怖いっちゃ！

source: Zezeroon's nose is filled with the sweet smells of meats and treats!
target:
ゼゼルン、はらへり
ぐーぐーっちゃ！

source: Zezeroon's ears are filled with the cracklings and sizzlings of supper!
target:
ごはん、ごはん、
急ぐっちゃ！

source: Zezeroon's heart is filled with joy! Thank you, adventurer!
target:
ゼゼルン、宴で、
いただきますっちゃ！

source: This one is so lost and lonely...
target:
ここは、どこなのほでふっち
案内してほしいのでふっち

source: Where, oh where is Little Solace?
target: どっちが仮宿なのでふっち？
まだ着かないのでふっち？

source: This one should never have left the camp...
target:
何か出そう
なのほでふっち……

source: This one shall never forget walking one's kindness.
target:
仮宿だふっち！
助かったのほでふっち！

source: Oh, what ever is a moogle to do?
target:
人気者は辛いクポ。
護衛をたのむでクポ！

source: I thought I said no autographs!
target: サインはお断りクポ！

source: Why don't I simply choose not to be seen? Pah! Then what sort of celebrity would that make me?
target:
護衛くん、
しっかり頼むクポ！

source: You can all look, but absolutely no touching, kupo!
target: モグは人気者クポ！

source: I'm still in one piece, I'll give you that, kupo. Now, where is everyone?
target:
護衛ご苦労だクポ！
ところでファンはどこクポ？

source: Are you wideheart uplander who is giving Guttrix walkpath safety?
target:
誰か来て来て
護衛して？

source: How can treelanders stand all these squigglevines and stranglevines?
target:
触手ウネウネ
だいきらい～

source: With fastness, lazyleg uplander! With fastness!
target:
ほいほい 進むぞ
どこまでも～

source: Guttrix is goodliest good gobbie goodsbearer!
target: ガットリクスいいゴブリン！

source: Many, many thanks, uplander! Be not un-remembering your gobbiefriend Guttrix!
target:
ほいほい
それでは さよ～なら～

source: I assume you're from the Adventurers' Guild. Shall we be off, then?
target:
入植地までの護衛、
しっかり頼むよ！

source: Come now. I wouldn't want to see the crop sold to another buyer on account that I was late in arriving.
target: さあ、行こうじゃないか

source: This area is a tad more...rough than I imagined.
target: しかし、この辺りも物騒になったもんだね

source: How can anyone survive the night, let alone run an entire farm with all these terrible creatures about!?
target: どんどん進むよ！

source: That was...thrilling, to say the least. Here's to hoping they deliver.
target:
ふぅ、到着したようだね、
助かったよ！

source: Kind adventurer keeps Memeroon safe? Come, come, then! Keep Memeroon safe, then!
target:
メメルン、おみせに帰るっちゃ
護ってほしいっちゃ！

メメルン、
とっても、怖いっちゃ

source: Oh, please! Oh, please! Keep Memeroon's sparklies safe!
target:
はやく、おみせに
帰りたいっちゃ！

source: Memeroon cannot be fighting! Must keep sparklies safe!
target:
メメルン、
戦い苦手っちゃ！

source: Memeroon is safe! Sparklies are safe! Should Memeroon share sparklies...?
target:
ここまで、来れば
大丈夫っちゃ！

source: Guttrix seeks kindly uplander to give walkpath safety!
target:
誰か来て来て
護衛して？

source: Guttrix makes busydeal with rainlanders. Many, many understones for purse full of jinglyshine!
target:
帰りのお船に
間に合うか～？

source: We must be moving legs with much fastness! Busydeal waits in keep of candles!
target:
お船があるのは
こっちかな～？
ガットリクスいいゴブリン！

source: Many, many thanks, uplander! Be not un-remembering your gobbiefriend Guttrix!
target:
よかった よかった
間に合った～！

source: See me as far as upper La Noscea and I shall see <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> pockets lined with gil.
target:
高地ラノシア方面まで
送ってくれればいいのさ

source: There are many an ailing soul up at the Warmwine Sanitorium who are in urgent need of this wine.
target:
傷病兵が待ってるんだ
急ぐとしようか

source: Used to be a woman could walk all the way from Bloodshore to Bronze Lake without suffering more than a blister.
target:
この辺りには
魔物がうろうろしてるんだよね

source: I sense danger all around us!
target: いやな汗をかいてきたよ

source: I believe I can complete the journey on my own. You have my thanks, adventurer.
target:
これでスパイスワインを
無事に届けられそうだよ！

source: Pardon me there, adventurer. Might you know the road to Ul'dah? I seem to be...lost.
target:
もしかして
案内してくれるのかい？

source: One would think a traveling merchant might have a better sense of direction.
target:
悪いね、
方向音痴なもんで……

source: Oh, I do hope this whole affair does not put a hamper on our shipping agreement.
target:
ツツシさん、
怒ってるかな？

source: You didn't happen to see aught stirring behind that cactus, did you?
target:
魔物の気配を
感じないか？

source: A thousand thousand thanks, adventurer. I shall give the Caravans your regards.
target:
ありがとう！
これで商談ができそうだ！

source: Guttrix makes no wrongdoing! Guttrix is no bad gobbie!
target:
誰か来て来て
護衛して？

source: Guttrix wants only busydeal with scalytails for much jinglyshine!
target:
商売できない
残念だ～

source: Lustyeye beasties seek munchings and crunchings!
target: 帰ろ帰ろ はよ帰ろ～
ガットリクスいいゴブリン！

source: Many, many thanks, uplander! But Guttrix will be back for more busydeals!
target:
ほいほい
それでは さよ～なら～

source: Did mah uncle send yah? He's always worrying.
target:
えっ？
ボクを探しにきたの？

source: I jus' wanted to see mah ma an' da.
target:
ただ父さんに
会いたかっただけなんだ

source: Ma an' Da are watching. That's what mah uncle says, but I never see 'em.
target: ……こ、怖くなんてないぞ

source: Mah uncle says one day, I'll be strong as mah da.
target:
父さん、
ボクは強くなるよ……

やっと帰ってこれた……
ありがとう、冒険者さん

source: I'll make sure to whet me cutlass for next time.
target: ちぃ、覚えてやがれっ！

source: Now! We must move before they return.
target: 今のうちに引き返すんです！
え、ええ、すぐ戻りましょう！

source: Yer coin...or yer life. Choose quickly, afore I takes me both!
target: 金目の物はいただくぜいっ！

source: You'd best do as he says.
target: くっ……ひ、退くしかない！
に、逃げましょうっ！

source: Our work here is complete. Now back to the custom house with these crates.
target: うむ、任務完了であります！

source: The conditions do not appear optimal for a raid. We shall take what we have and return for the rest another time.
target: これは状況が悪い……撤収っ！

source: What in the seven hells got into them?
target: あのシープたち、何なんだ？

source: Retreating from sheep... Now I'll never make sergeant...
target: こ、後退、後退しろーっ！
しょ～ばいで　ずるしたね～？
ずるっこ　ダメ　おこる～！
ぼくたち　だますの　ダメ～！
ウソつき～　ゆるさない～！
あ～たると　い～たいよ～！
お～こって　るんだ～よ～！
まだまだ　ゆるせ～ないよ～！
これで～も　くらえ～よ～！
や、や～ら～れ～た～！
お～ぼえてな～よ～！
く～やし～いよ～！
じかんの　むだだったよ～！
しょ～ばい　も～どろ～！
べつのしょ～ばい　やろ～？

source: Cease with this nonsense at once or both yer arses'll be rottin' in the brig!
target: ほら、仕事に戻れお前ら！

source: If ye put it that way...
target: ……この、わからずやどもめ！

source: Ain't no woman worth pissin' in a bucket fer, I reckon.
target: ミコッテが最高なのに……

source: Would you two listen!? She loves neither of you!
target: くっ……お、お前ら仕事に……
ふむ、ミコッテ族もありかもな
ララフェル族もなかなか……

source: Well, then I'll jus' 'ave to make 'er!
target: よし、ちょっくら語り合うか！
おうともよ！
……な、なんて迷惑な奴らだ
シュコォ……シュコォ……
わなし　これで　かえるよ～！
わるいやつ　た～おす～！
ここ　よそもの　くるな～！

source: Tryptix wishes no busydeal! Tryptix takes uplander jinglyshine!
target: いたく～　し～ちゃうよ～？

source: Uplander filling with heartthumps as beauteous fighty-tool swishes and swooshes!
target: てかげん～　し～ない～！
キキルンの入店はお断りだ
この匂い……さっそく来たか

source: Cheers. Ever think of workin' as a heavy?
target: 片付いたら一杯サービスな！

source: I told you to never come back!
target: お前ら、くせーんだよ！
さっさと帰れ！
しつこいっ！

source: Sod off, shite-breath! The ale's sourin'.
target: 他の客に迷惑だろーが！

source: I have no qualms with killin' me a rat.
target: 怪我してーのか！？

source: Ale and wine! Wine and ale!
target: 酒がぶがぶっちゃ！
ちゃりちゃり、あるっちゃ

source: Qiqirn smells no like rat. Qiqirn smells like Qiqirn!
target: くんくん……へいきっちゃ！
入店させるっちゃ

source: Qiqirn hates blood. Qiqirn loves wine!
target: お客、ぼこぼこ？

source: Those rats'll think twice afore showin' their ugly mugs 'round here again soon.
target: よし、片付いたな！

source: I'd offer you a drink on the house. But it ain't my house, so my thanks'll have to serve.
target: 心置きなく飲んでけよ

source: Now I think I'll have that bonny wench see to me hurts. Heh heh heh.
target: 俺も休憩すっかな
諦めたか……

source: They don't pay me enough for this...
target: くそ、なんてザマだよ

source: I needs me a stiff drink.
target: イテテ、手当てしねーと……
不滅隊、きたきた！？
仕事のじかんっちゃ……

source: More sparklies for you, more ale for Qiqirn!
target: またくるっちゃ！

source: Qiqirn drinks whole cask and wears on head!
target: 次は酒樽っちゃ！
この悪臭、やつが来たか……！

source: Ale for Guguroon! Ale for all!
target: ググルン～がぶがぶっちゃ～
ヴェ、ヴェッグファル様！？
ひぃ！俺たちまで！！
こ、殺される！！

source: You're soft! Soft like a baby's arse!
target: 甘いぞ！

source: Going to let some adventurer shame you like that, eh!?
target: もっと気合い入れんか！
者ども、戦いだッ！　加勢しろッ！

source: My wounds! Someone see to my wounds!
target: クソッ！　ケアルができる奴、手を貸せッ！
クソクソクソッ！　誰でもいい早く来いッ！
クワ～ッ！

source: Cap'n is strong! Cap'n is strong! Squawk!
target: オカシラ、ツヨイ！
オカシラ、ハンサム！

source: Batten down the hatches! Batten down the hatches! Squawk!
target: オカシラ、イヤラシイ！
オモイダシチマッタゼッ！
シャレニナランゾ！
いや～すっきりしたな～！

source: Maybe now I can finally get some work done.
target: 助かったよ、ありがとな♪

source: What work is that, you ask?
target: これで畑に専念できる

source: Why, pullin' weeds, of course! Ones that don't bite back, mind you.
target: また、よろしく頼むよ！

source: The damned things are like weeds.
target: やっぱ根絶やしは無理か……

source: I suppose there's no escapin' them.
target: 次こそ全部引っこ抜いてやる！

source: Best I return to the fields and assess the damage.
target: と、とにかく畑だ！

source: I reckon I have a lot of replantin' to do.
target: 畑だけは死守してやるー！
では、急ぎましょう

source: Watch your footing, lest the sand drag you under.
target: さっそく出発しましょう
…すまん、頼む

source: I didn't want it to come to this!
target: おまえら覚悟しろ！！
邪魔しやがってッ！
お、俺たちの金づるが！

source: Well, don't jus' stand there, ye dogs!
target:
こうなったら、
殺るしかねえぞッ！

source: Get yer heads out of yer arses and heal me wounds!
target: クッ、押されている！？

source: Ye can have the ruddy turtle!
target: 何…だと…？
畜生めぇ～ッ！
羽根ナシィィ！
グウッ！　ナニヤツ……！？
…ウルズよ…いずこに…

source: Urth... One day, I <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> find thee...
target: …ウルズよ…そなたの元へ…
…ウルズよ…今度こそ…

source: Who is it that would deny me passage?
target: …我が道を阻むというのか…
…愚かな…
…魔剣の嘆きを聞け…

source: Here I stand─a god amongst men. Yet here I remain─a mere man amongst gods.
target: …我は神にして神にあらず…

source: Mine obsidian blade shalt split atwain the threads of thy future...
target: …我が魔剣よ…

source: ...whilst its crimson fuller shalt channel the lifeblood of thy past!
target: …すべてを断て…

source: Thou knowest not thy folly. Forfeit is thy waking soul...
target: …次はオマエが…我が身体に…

source: The sea'll wait. She always does.
target: もう、海には戻れねえか…

source: The mill needs mendin'. We need concern ourselves with naught more.
target: 復興、させねえとな…

source: It may take these legs a few more summers to get used to the land.
target: もうここしかねえんだ
海…サイッコー…

source: One day, I'll be back on the Blue. I swear it.
target: あきらめきれねえんだ…
ここは俺たちの土地だ！

source: As much to be had on land, as there be on the sea, I reckon.
target: 陸も結構、刺激的ね
次のお客さんは誰かしら…

source: 'Tis time we learned to be lubbers.
target: 陸、嫌いじゃないわ

source: Danger in these woods. Lots of scaries scares the sparklies.
target: さっきの、なんだっちゃ？

source: Open for trade! Trade for sparklies!
target: お店、ひらくっちゃ！
今日も大儲けっちゃ！
くっ、幻術士様……支援を！

source: Conjurer, I cannot stand much longer!
target: くぅ……幻術士様、お力を！
ウルフどもを食い止めるぞ！

source: Not a single wolf shall pass on my watch!
target: ここから先へは通さんっ！
イクサル族を食い止めるのだ！
この勝利、デュランデルの名に！
一旦逃げんだよッォ！
邪魔ッァ！！
そこをどけってんだッァ！
らッァ、くらえええッェ！！
ドラゴンの眷属だわっ！
やった…我々の勝利よっ！
フォルタンの名誉にかけて！
戦神ハルオーネの祝福あれ！

source: You will not have our camp!
target: ここを死守するっ！

source: Sound the alarum! The enemy draws nigh!
target: 備えよ、ドラゴンの眷属だ！
イシュガルドに栄光あれ！
この地は死守する、必ずだ！

source: The knights of House Durendaire will never break!
target: デュランデルの意地を見よ！

source: The feast is about to begin...and your minds are the main course!
target:
饗宴の幕は上がった…
さあ、脳髄を差し出せ…

source: Dance for me, slave of stone!
target: 傀儡は踊る…無限の舞いを…

source: Another dance, my slave! The dance of death!
target: 愛しき傀儡よ…死を踊れ…
すべては救世神の為に！
クッ……こうなったらッ！

source: Now from the depths of the seven hells will terror rise!
target:
常闇に眠る傀儡の王よ、
我が声に応えよ！

source: Open the gates, my lord, and send your minions through!
target: ヴォイドの深淵より来たれ！

source: Heed me, servants of the Hound! Your place is in this realm!
target: 我が呼び声に応えたまえ！

source: You cannot stop what has already begun!
target: 邪魔をさせる訳にはッ！

source: The children of the wood are no match for the denizens of the dark!
target: グリダニアの犬どもがッ！

source: Dalamud will lap at your lifeblood and grow ever stronger!
target: 背教者どもめ、死ねッ！

source: The corruption is worse than I expected...
target: 想定以上に、ひどい淀みです

source: I have time to do naught but defend...
target: 土が得意なのに、防ぐだけで手一杯…

source: This corruption must be sluiced clean.
target: 淀みを洗い流さねば……

source: Ready your blades! We meet the gigas on the field!
target: ギガース族だ、迎撃準備ーっ！

source: The site is ours! Back with you to your mountains of cold!
target: この地は絶対に渡さん！

source: I never met a beast I couldn't eat! And tonight it looks like a feast!
target: ヒッポグリフだぞーっ！

source: Gah hah! Start the fires! I'll ready the meat!
target: 思い通りにはさせない！
私も……自然の力を借りてみる……

source: I can feel it! The strength of nature flows through me!
target: 自然の力が、自分の中に流れ込んでくる！

source: Are you here to guide me back to camp? Splendid!
target:
あぁ、救援か！
助かったよ！

source: I apologize. I was examining that amazing formation.
target: 調査に没頭していたんだ…

source: None of those pesky gigas up ahead, are there?
target: ギガース族はいないよな？

source: You are certain this route is safe?
target: 今、何か見えたような…

source: Ah, back at the camp. And just in time for treacle tart!
target:
ふぅ…やっと着いた！
ありがとう、助かったよ！

この禁書の力でッェ、
始末してやるッゥ！

異界の嵐よッォ！
この地で吹き荒れろッォ！

異界の氷魔よッォ！
我が敵を凍てつかせよッォ！

source: Rise from the void! I summon thee! Squaaaaaark!
target:
異界の魔人よッォ！
その獲物を屠れッェ！

高みに舞うにはッァ、
手柄…が…

source: I AM MIMAS! MIMAS CRUSH YOU!
target: オデの名は、ミマスだぁぁぁ！
いぬっころ、来いぃぃぃ！
オデ、怒ったどぉぉぉ！
手伝ってくんろぉぉぉ！
オデの負け…なのけ？

source: Tracking me to the ends of the realm... You truly are naught but the archbishop's hounds.
target:
ここまで追ってきたか！
教皇庁の犬め…

source: Descend on these pawns, my friends!
target: さあ、我が友よ！

source: Come to me, O ye of ancient blood!
target: 来たれ、我が友よッ！

竜の力の前に！
ひれ伏すがいい！

source: Beware... My death...will only serve to stir others...
target:
命尽きるか。
我が命、竜の元へ……

source: MY PEOPLE CLIMB TOWER AND RETURN TO HEAVENS!
target:
我らは蒼き塔に登るゥ！
天への階段をォォォ！

source: MY PET SUCKS MARROW FROM YOUR BONES!
target:
エサの時間だァ！
ほれほれェ、喰え喰えェ！

source: THEY ARE NOT ALL WHO HEED MY CALL!
target:
グヌヌヌゥ…
力を貸せェェェ！

source: YOU ARE STRONG, BUT WE ARE STRONGER!
target:
手強い奴めェ…
来いィ、相棒よォォォ！

天への階段をォ…
登り…たかっ…たァ…
異端の仲間を捕らえなさい
これで勝てる！
負けは許されませんよ
今こそ来たれ…！

よし、このまま
制圧する！

source: These things are as soft as yer mum's arse!
target: コイツ弱いぜ！

source: It's like slaughtering pigs in a pen! Ugly green pigs, mind ye.
target: ハハッ！楽勝だな！
う、うわぁぁぁぁぁ！

source: K-K-Keep away from me, you monster!
target: な、何だコイツ！？
また出やがったッ！
や、やばいんじゃ？

source: Hear the screams of my fallen brothers!
target:
オオオォォォォ……
同胞たちの怨みを知れェ！
し、しつけぇ奴らだ！

source: I will repay this debt, good adventurer!
target: そうか、助かるっ！

source: Now, we must make haste. The wolves are not but a few yalms back.
target: よし、キャンプへ急ごう！
目ざとい奴らだ！

source: We must show them our strength, or the pack will continue their pursuit!
target: くそっ、追い払ってくれ！

source: Back to the wood with you, kwaaark!
target: どけってんだよッォ！
邪魔だっぜッェ！！
んだらぁっしゃッァ！！

source: Can you bear the wind, smoothskin!?
target: オオルッァ！！

source: Squark! This is no place for you! Leave at once!
target: ナっめんじゃあ…ねッェ！

source: I shall teach you to fly! Straight into the chasm!
target: ザコはすっこんでろやッァ！
ぶっ…つぶれろッォ！！

source: Something not of this world walks the sands. It must be stopped!
target: なんだ、あの不気味な魔物は！

source: We can only pray there are no more...
target: 止まった…やった、やったぞ！

source: The flames of our Lord cleanse us of our sins.
target: 焔神イフリートのために！

source: Tempered in fire, our hearts grow harder!
target: 焼き鍛えられし魂を見よ！

source: Let the holy flames engulf you!
target: これが聖火の力ッ！

source: Halt! Do not think we won't strike you in the back!
target: 動くな、止まれ貴様ら！
邪魔を…するな！

source: The punishment for your insolence will be swift!
target: 焔神に仇なす者どもめ…！

source: Witness the power of the undying flame!
target: 真なる神の力を知れ！

source: The taste of victory is always bitter when fouled by Ul'dahn blood.
target: なんとか…止められたか

source: It's as if a mountain has come to life!
target: で、でかいっ…

source: If I never see a living mountain again, it will be too soon!
target: ふぅ…終わってくれたか
貴様らを見逃すことはできん！

source: Know what we do is for your own good and the good of the realm!
target: かつての同志とはいえ…

く、傀儡の王よ……
我が敵を討ちたまえ……
ゲゲ、グゲゲゲゲ！！
ヴオオオオ！
オデたちがイチバンだぁぁ！
ブチ壊すぅぅぅ！
奴隷ドモめがぁぁぁ！
突撃ぃぃぃ！
聖地を我らにぃぃぃ！
邪魔するなぁぁぁ！
ジャマはオメェだぁぁぁ！
フクシュウだぁぁぁ！
ブオオオオ！

source: PUNY SONS OF MAN! RUN WHILE YOU CAN!
target: 蹴散らしてくれるわ！
たたきツブスぅぅぅ！
ウヌヌ、ヌォォォォ！
敵はどこだぁぁぁ！
グオラァァァ！
タスケニきたどぉぉぉ！
聖地は我らのものぞぉぉぉ！
マケねぇ、マケねぇどぉぉぉ！
グハハハハハハ！
フクロダダキドァァァ！
イゲェェェ！
総員集結だぁぁぁ！
我らが主よぉぉぉ！
主に力をぉぉぉ！
タ、タズケてくれぇぇぇ！
ダンナをイジメたのダレだぁぁぁ！
オマエ、ダズケてくんろぉぉぉ！
グオオオ！フクシュウだぁぁぁ！
オデ、オコッたどぉぉぉ！
ダンナ、いくどぉぉぉ！
オマエ、いくどぉぉぉ！
ダ、ダンナ…ダンナぁぁぁ！
オ、オマエ…オマエぇぇぇ！
グホッ…イデェ、イデェ…
グヌゥ…マダダァ…
これより、任務を開始する！
了解っ！

source: Hark! 'Tis the sound of their steps as they approach!
target: この足音…来るぞ！

source: Gods... There must be hundreds of them...
target: この戦力では、勝ち目が…

source: Silence! Are you a craven or are you a knight of House Haillenarte!?
target: 勝つ気がないのか、貴様ッ
…ともかく、様子を見よう
いくぞ、攻撃開始だぁ！
こんなところで死ねるか！

source: Better to be a live coward than a dead...anything!
target: も、もうイヤだ～ッ！
無念、誰か仇を頼む…
寒い…僕は死ぬのか…？

source: A fine display! If only those who ran could have witnessed your bravery!
target: 君の協力に感謝する！

source: Damnation! Fall back to Camp Dragonhead!
target: ここまでか…撤退する！
緊急事態発生～！

source: Lock your doors! Batten your windows!
target: 魔物の襲来に備えよ～！

source:
The goobbues are coming!
The goobbues are coming!
target: 餓えたグゥーブーだぁっ！
俺たちの…勝ちだ！

source: They are too much for us! To the Locks! We shall regroup there!
target: …撤退だ、一時撤退する！
ひぃぃ…
死にたくない！

source: Your tempering will come soon enough, mortals!
target: 覚えておれ、異教徒ども！

source: I say, are there none who would escort me?
target: あの、腕自慢はいませんかー？
助かります、ではよろしく

source: Stay alert, my friend. The gigas in these parts have no love for our kind.
target: さあ、ここからですよ…

source: Would you look at this! A remarkable specimen!
target: むむっ、これは！？

source: Can you see how the crystal resonates with the sound of our footsteps?
target: これは…すごいです！

source: Simply marvelous! I must have a closer look!
target: ほほう、これはなかなか

source: The Sons back at the camp will not believe this!
target: ううむ、興味深いものが…
ふぅ、やっと到着ですね

source: It was a miracle that we met with nary a single setback.
target: 魔物が出ないのは、幸運でした

source: I suppose I have you to thank for that!
target: ひとりでも大丈夫だったかな？
まぁとにかく、感謝です！
やっと去ったか…

source: Nothing! The howling has finally subsided!
target: これで何とか帰れそうだ

source: I will live to see another sunrise. My thanks to you, adventurer!
target: 助かったよ…またな
うわ、なんだこりゃ！？

source: Any closer and we'll be eaten alive!
target: これじゃ通れんな…

source: But these sacks must be delivered! What can I do?
target: 誰か、何とかしてくれぇ！
クェッ！

source: They're gone! I can complete my delivery!
target: おお、通れるように！

source: I don't know how to thank you! Oh, wait! Gil!
target: ありがとよ、あんたっ
クェェェッ！

source: Another day lost. My employer will take this directly from my pay...
target: …引き返すしかねぇか

source: Giant's foot, my rosy red arse!
target: うーむ、まいったな…

source: We did the best we could...
target: これじゃ進めないぜ…

source: Might be I can reason with them. I studied giant at the scholasticate and am fluent in four dialects.
target: ねぇ、一旦引き返す？
おお、やってくれるか！

source: You won't mind if we stay back a few paces...just in case.
target: 頼んだぞ、冒険者！

source: Holler if you need my help with the dialects!
target: すご～い、たっのもし～！
いい腕だ…ホレボレするな
協力に感謝する、冒険者よ

source: I must admit, those who say the pen is mightier than the sword...
target: すっげぇなぁ、オイ！
おかげでスッキリしたぜ！

source: I still think we could have reasoned with them...
target: わ～、すっご～い！

source: ...though, they did not appear to respond to any of the dialects...
target: あ～りが～とね～！

source: This is not over, you hear me!?
target: …こりゃ無理だ、出直しだな

source: I knew we should have just gone back to the Front.
target: くそっ、ムカつくぜ！

source: You see. You should have let me reason with them! Four dialects, I said! Four!
target: あらら、ざんね～ん

source: Enemy at the Gates! Secure the portcullis!
target: 敵襲ッ、敵襲ゥゥゥッ！！
ドラゴン族の侵攻だぁっ！
総員、迎撃準備ッ！！

source: How many sailors are on this ship!?
target: くっ、予想より敵が多い！

source: I have this front in hand!
target: ここは、引き受けたよっ！
ちっ、使えん野郎どもだ！

source: Stand clear, unless you fancy a trampling!
target: どきなさい、蹴散らされたいの！？
ジャイアントどもが来るようだ！
これより迎撃作戦を開始する！

source: Do not let them gain the shore!
target: 渡河を許すな、攻撃開始ッ！！
よし、状況を終了するッ！

source: Gather the wounded. We make for the Observatorium immediately.
target: 皆よくやった、これより帰還する！
くっ…なんということだ…！

source: Gather the wounded and fall back to the Observatorium!
target: …ここまでだな、撤退する

source: Look! The spirit of Saint Daniffen!
target: おや、あれはなんでしょう？
ああ、なんと恐ろしい！

source: O Wrathful Fury in heavens on high! Pray give me strength to overcome the evils of this world.
target: おお…戦神ハルオーネよ…！
神よ、お守りください…
お…おお…こ、これは…！
神よ、ありがとうございます！
なんという…ことでしょう…
神よ、神よ…なぜなのです…！

source: Figures to be a cold one, today. 'Twas a cold one yesterday, too.
target: はぁ～っ、今日も寒いなぁ

source: And I would guess them's the reason why!
target: あ、ありゃあ、まさか…？

source: Ice sprites! Push them back from the Cloak!
target: アイススプライトだ、止めろっ！
感謝を…
よし、任せとけ！

source: Mamool Ja bandits spotted out beyond the rise!
target: マムージャ族の盗賊だっ！

source: Drop weapons and gil, you live!
target: ムダ、な抵抗はよせ！
金目、のもの、を出せ！

source: We'll find ye one day. And when we do, it's to the brig with ye!
target: 二度と来るな！

source:
Mamool Ja no run.
Mamool Ja <var 1A 02 /var>plan<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: 一時退却、だ…

source: Sound the bell! The Sahagin approach!
target: サハギン軍が攻めてきたぞ！
サハギン軍を追い返せ！

source: You shhhall drown in your own blood!

target: 思い知ったか、魚野郎どもめ！

source: The bell! The bell! Fishbacks march from the south!
target: サハギン軍を確認！

source: This wall has stood for five summers unbreached, and it shall stand another five hundred!

source: Me blade will cut yer flesh like the sea.

source: Ye should 'ave run while ye 'ad the chance!

source: Protect the pickman! Protect the mines!

source: Somethin' ain't right with them raptors...

target: 御神よ、我らが誓願を届け給え…♪

ウオオーオオーオオ♪

source: Fear not the frigid hands of death...
target: 兵貴神速、攻撃を開始するッ！

source: ...for the flames have foretold our victory!

source: We did it! Here's the forty-eight percent, as promised.

source: Fifty-one, you say? Are you certain?

source: Alright, alright. Let's make it forty-nine and a half and call the deal square! Ta-ta!

source: Not only couldn't you do away with the toads, but you managed to trample up the entire camp!
target: 負けたし、地面もグチャグチャね…

target: 俺様は最強だー！
そりゃ！
どりゃあッ！

ぜぇ…ぜぇ…

source: I could have used a few more round pegs, but such is life!

source: I'll show you why the 3rd Cohort is most feared in the legion!

source: The young ones must not fall into dark hands!
target: ゆりかごを守るでふっち！

source: This one's heart is filled with wrath!
target: わたしが相手になるでふっち！

source: Spoken ones must leave at once!

source: Have your weapon ready. It is not a question of if the Horde finds us, but when.

target: カノン砲をお見舞いしてやる！

油断しちまった…

source: It appears we have made it with all our limbs still attached.
target: なんとか…無事に到着ですねぇ

source: The gigas are naught but cowards.
target: 資材を狙うとは、小賢しい…

source: You might want to wait before completing that thought.

source: Th-Th-They don't look all that cowardly from here!

source: Shields together! Form a wall around the findings!
target: 資材を守るぞ、身体を張れ！

source: Not even time for a piss, eh?
target: ええい、少しは休ませろッ！！
気が抜けないわね、まったく！
いまこそうらみをはらすとき～
みんなでうらみをはらすとき～

オォォォォ……
光を奪われた怨みを受けよォ！
なッ……後ろを取られた！？
いい加減に観念しろい！

♪狂乱～
　それは甘き死の旋律

source: In most circumstances, I would commend you on your bravery and send you on your way.

source: ...but these documents aren't going to carry themselves to the camp.

source: Seems the gigas had a bit more fight in them than I thought.

source: Isn't there anyone who can help me?

好きにはさせんぞ！

target: まだ死ねないのに！
早く倒してくれ！

やれやれ…酷い目にあった

source: Hapalits!? You look as if you could use some help!

source: At least we were able to force them back...
target: …とりあえず、戻ってくれたか…

source: Those Mamool Ja wear the sign of the Crag! Their loyalty has been bought by the kobolds!

source: This road now kobold road. Pay in gil or pay in blood!

source: The beastmen <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> make an attempt at our supplies.

source: And we will see that they fail, sir!
target: はっ！
グエッ！

待ち伏せされたか！？
うわっ！！隊長、後ろ…！
ちっ、武器を構えろ！

source: We're out of the fire, but not clear of the kitchen. Push ahead!

協力に、感謝する

source: We are still quite far from our destination. Stay close.

問題ありません

source: If I were any closer, you could smell the squirrel I ate this morning.
target: いつでも行けます！
では、出発しましょう
グェッ、グエエエ！
ど、どうした！？
逃げ出しちまった

source: How's this─you two wait here with the good 'bo, and I'll look for the other?

source: Are you sure that's a good idea? The jungle is rife with danger.
target: 頼む、こっちは先に行っておく
グエエエエエ！？

source: What in the seven hells is wrong with you? You've been kwarking since we left!
target: どうした！？
くっ、魔物が……！

source: That was closer than I would have liked.
target: 助かりました
あいつがまだ来てないぞ…？

source: That was quite the piss. Are you sufficiently relieved, then?

source: Bah, I'd tell you, but you wouldn't believe me anyway.

source: And that we can agree on.

source: I suppose there are worse ways to die...
target: 遅れたか、くそっ

だ…誰か、誰か助けてっ！
はぁ、ふぅ…はぁ、はぁ…

source: You are truly a hero! If only I could find a man like you!
target: あ…ありがとうございます！
じゃあ、後は頼みますね！
グゲゲッ！

source: Not me! That one! Eat that one!
target: ひぃぃぃっ！？

source: Many sparklies for Jijiroon. Jijiroon overjoyed!
target: チャリチャリ、もりもりっちゃ！

source: Little sparklies for Jijiroon. Jijiroon drowns sorrows in pelican eggs.
target: チャリチャリ、ちょっぴりっちゃ…
ふふふっち、ふふふっち…

source: La la la la la la la la la LA LA LA LA LA LA la LA la LA LA!
target: ラリラリラ～でふっち～！
ミルクルートうまいでふっち～！
でゅふ、でゅふふ…でふっち

source:
Bad spoken one!
Bad spoken one!
target: はっ…い、いや、帰るでふっち！
…ここはだれだふっち？
ふっちふっちふっちちち…

source: Root! This one needs more root!
target: もっとミルクルートくれふっち！

target: なんだかたのしいでふっち！
あたまがくらくらするでふっち～

source: Why can I not bathe in springs!?
target: 何故、入れぬの、だ！？

source: I've already told you. It is forbidden.
target: 何度も説明してるだろ？

source: My coin, same coin as smoothskins'!
target: 湯浴みの踊り、が問題だ、と？

source: This is not about your <var 1A 02 /var>coin<var 1A 01 /var>. It is about your <var 1A 02 /var>behavior<var 1A 01 /var>.

踊りへの苦情が殺到したんだ

source: Mamool Ja have eyes. Eyes must see something!
target: 我らの伝統、を侮辱し、おって！

source: And the...unsightly grinding and gyrating of your pelvic region.

source: Ah! Traditional Mamool Ja bathing dance!

source: I care not what you call it! It will not be tolerated!

source: I pay my coin! I dance my dance!

source: Leave this place and never return!
target: 文化の摩擦ってやつだ

source: Memories only fade if there is no one to remember them...
target: たつけてほちいでふっち…
あ、ありがとふっち…！

source: As long as this one has life, the memory of the fallen ones will endure.
target: きょうも…ダメだったふっち…
どかぬ、なら腕ずくで入、る！

source: I'm afraid I cannot allow that!

source: Today we march on the encampment!
target: アマルジャ軍陣屋を強襲する！
ハッ！！

source: Whatever happens, do not break! Understood!?

おおおっ！
前方より敵襲、油断するなよ！
おうっ！！
う、後ろから敵が！

source: The Amalj'aa... They knew we were coming!

…イヤな気配を感じるな

source: If I am not at the plant in a bell, I will be ruined!

source: Splendid! Now let us hurry. There is no time to lose!

source: What was that!? I think I saw something move!
target: チョイ待った！
よぉし、よし…大丈夫だ

source: One cannot be too careful, you know.
target: ふぅ…問題はなさそうかな

source: Shhh! Did you hear that? No?
target: 念には念を入れて…

source: Wait! Now, you may think I am being overly cautious, but...
target: しつこいとお思いでしょうが…

source: You know how the proverb goes...
target: ここは慎重に…

source: It's better to be safe than strung up and gralloched by a bloodthirsty maniac!
target: 行きましょう…！

source: There is something ahead... I can <var 1A 02 /var>feel<var 1A 01 /var> it!
target: どうも不安でして

source: We are not but a quarter malm from the plant but...
target: もう目の前ですが…

source: I... I made it in one piece! Thank the Twelve!
target: 大丈夫だろうか…？

source: If only you could have gotten me here sooner!
target: では、商談に行ってまいります！
お、おわぁぁぁっ！？

source: Caution can ofttimes be a man's best friend!
target: ほら出たぁっ！

source:
You see! You see!
I felt it! I <var 1A 02 /var>felt<var 1A 01 /var> it!
target: う、うわぁっ！魔物だぁっ！

source: I have no coin! I promised it all to the adventurer! That's the one you want!
target: ま、魔物にやる金はないっ！
なぜ、だ…なぜ、許されぬ…

source: Mamool Ja is man, like all men...
target: 湯浴みしたい、だけなのに…
行ってくれたか…

source: Now, back to...er...seeing that these women are...uh...safe. Yes.
target: でも、あの踊りはなぁ…

source: No man talks ill of Mamool Ja custom and lives!
target: 伝統、を軽んじた罰、ぞ！

source: You, lucky today. I come back tomorrow. I come back and dance!
target: 興ざめ、だ帰るっ！！
迷惑な野郎だ、まったく…
また来るんだろうなぁ…

source: I'm not paying you another man's coin to let them manhandle me!
target: だ、だから慎重にって…

source: Not the tunic! This cost me a fortune!
target: どうしてあたしがこんな目に！？
ああ、神様どうか…
ひぃぃ、目が怖いぃぃぃっ！

source: Stop playing around, adventurer, and get this thing off of me!
target: いやだ…食べないでくれぇっ！
魔物なんかに殺されたくないっ！
くそ、厳しいな…

source: A fine spring that was! The view was simply spectacular!
target: いいお湯だった…穴場発見ね
これじゃ帰れないわ…

source: How am I to get back to camp?
target: 困っちゃうな、もう…

source: Oh, I cannot begin to express my gratitude!
target: すごい！おかげで帰れそう！

source: I was in a cold sweat for the duration.
target: でも、冷や汗かいたから…

source: Perhaps I should go back to the spring and warm up...
target: もうひと風呂浴びて、帰ろっと

source: What ever is a Lalafell to do?
target: 帰れそうにないわね…

source: I suppose I'll just have to return to the spring and wait.
target: 温泉につかって待つしかないわ

source: Though, now that I think about it, another dip would be quite refreshing!
target: この小屋に泊めてもらえるかな…

source: Why must you overdwellers always disturb my research!? Why!? Why!?
target: 実験の材料～に　してや～る

source: My next experiment will use your blood! Your blood!
target: 研究の邪～魔したな！

source: The Gyve will not fall to the sons of man!
target: 進退困窮。此処で滅せよ！

source: No manner of spell or steel can penetrate our wall!
target: 堅城鉄壁。抜かせはせぬ！
不失正鵠。我が弓に死角なし！

source: You will drown in a storm of arrows!
target: 電光石火。百の矢を受けよ！

source: Run! Your back will make an easy target!
target: 追奔逐北。逃げられはせぬ…！

source: The Amalj'aa are attempting a summoning! We must silence them before it's too late!
target: 誰か、協力をお願いします！

source: We've a hero in our midst.
target: おお、ありがとう冒険者さん！
儀式、阻止してくださいね！
やりましたね、さすがです！

source: This should keep the lizards quiet for a spell.
target: これでしばらくは大人しいはず…

source: But don't think they won't be back. They always are.
target: あなたのご協力に感謝を！
ああ、失敗…なんてことなの

source: If a few sand lizards cannot be stopped, then we are doomed!
target: …結果はともかく協力に感謝です

source: You have my thanks, adventurer. Do not let our failure here discourage you.
target: 次こそは、必ず儀式を…！

source: I must be returning soon, so if you happen to have a core or five in your pocket...
target: まだ持ってるなら、受け取るよ！

source: The ceruleum is safe for another day! From stray vibrations, that is. A single bomb and...boom!
target: やあ、助かったよ…協力に感謝さ

source: Not as many cores as I had hoped...
target: ちょっと足りないな…残念だよ

source: I'll just have to cross both fingers tonight, then.
target: 仕方ないね、補給を待つか

source: It'll take me the better part of the day to move all these crates back up into Wineport...
target: ひとりで、こんなに運べない…

source: The buccaneers! Keep them back from me wine!
target: 早く奴らを退治してくれ
ありがとうございました、でも…

source: It's still strewn about the ground... <sigh> But at least it's safe!
target: ワイン集めの助っ人を探すか…
あぁ…、やられた…

source: I think I needs me a drink...
target: はぁ、今日はやけ酒だ…

source: Me wine... I can't bear to look!
target: 命だけは、お助けを…

source: The vintner'll have me head...if the pirates don't get it first!
target: 高級なワインだったのに…

source: What was that shattering? Was it a bottle!?
target: あぁ、中の瓶が割れちゃう…

source: Back to the jungle with you, you dirty thieves!
target: 賊の勝手は許さん！
市民を守る！

source: Your head will look good on a pike above the hamlet gates!
target: 蹴散らしてやる！

source: And don't think of coming back!
target: 追い払えたようだな
盗賊など敵ではない！
鍛え方が違うのだ！

source: We've failed you... Please accept our apologies.
target: すまぬ、力不足で…

source: A few more blades and we would have had them!
target: くそ、もう少し援軍があれば…
あいつら、許さぬ！
どけどけどけ！
ひゃっはー！

source: Looks like yer 'avin' a spot o' trouble wiv the wain!
target: 命がおしけりゃ、抵抗すんな！

source: Who says the Twelve don't smile on pirates!?
target: ワインはもらった！

source: Ever 'eard o' the law o' possession!?
target: お前のものは俺のもの！

source: Why buy what ye can take!?
target: 欲しいものは奪う！

source: We'll be seein' ye again, peddler!
target: 覚えてやがれっ！
ちきしょー！
さあ、飲むぜ～！
邪魔だ、どけ！
いったん、にげるでふっち！

source: Leave the dead. They will only weigh us down.
target: ガレマール帝国、万歳－ッ！！

source: To die at the hands of a beastman...
target: に…任務、失敗…！

source: Imperial ones foul the wood with smoke and soot!
target: これはふっちのぶんだふっち！

source: Revenge for fallen ones shall be swift!
target: ぜったいにゆるさんでふっち！

source: Now that the imperial unit is no more, the remaining sylphs have drawn back into the wood.
target: よくやった、これでしばらくは…
テンパードシルフが戻ってきた！

source: My thanks. Without your help, I would be lying there cold with the other imperial corpses.
target: すまない、おかげで助かった

source: Your treachery will not be allowed in the Twelveswood!
target: このっ、双蛇党をなめるなよ！
こんなところで死ねるかよ！
てめぇ、ぶっ潰す！
この野郎！
ふっざけんな！

source: I'll skin ye and throw yer bones to dogs!
target: 邪魔すんじゃねぇ！

source: Make ready, then. The buccaneers could be here at any m─
target: さっそく、お願いします…！
ん…、あれは盗賊！？

source: The place'll be swarmin' wiv honeybees and the Admiral's 'ounds.
target: 攻めて、攻めて、攻めまくれ！

source: I ain't never met an 'oneybee I couldn't swat, nor an 'ound I couldn't kick.
target: 黒渦団？楽勝だ！

source: I'm goin' to drink meself a river, that's what I'm goin' to do!
target: ワイン浴びるほど飲むぞ！

source: Been a long while since I drunk me some real red. I've 'ad enough o' that shite Shorty makes in 'is boot.
target: 奪った酒で祝杯だ！
やっちまえ！

source: How's this fer a plan─I'll do the cuttin', ye'll do the guttin'.
target: 戦略なんていらねえ！

source: Workin' up a right thirst, what wiv all this fightin'.
target: くそ、邪魔すんな！

source: Ye 'ave no right to be here!
target: 俺らが、何したってんだ！
盗賊をなめんな！

source: We was just mindin' our own!
target: ふっざけんな、どけ！

source: Damn the Admiral's 'ounds to the seventh 'ell!
target: くそっ、かなわねぇぜ…

source: Ye'll pay fer this! A pirate never forgets!
target: この借りは、返してみせるっ！

source: Damn the Admiral's hounds to the seventh hell!
target: ちっ、邪魔がはいった…

source: There'll be no raidin' till these bloody 'urts mend.
target: くそ、黒渦団のやつらめ…

source: Alright, you filthy scrags! Your plan is up!
target: 賊の計画など、打ち砕く！

source: Throw down your weapons or feel the brunt of the storm!
target: 我らの力を思い知れっ！

source: This is easier than jointing a pig!
target: 訓練代わりにもならんぞ！
ほらほら、どうした！？
当然の結果だ

source: When has a band of landlocked pirates ever been a match for the Maelstrom?
target: 賊など、我らの敵ではない！

source: The louder they are, the quieter it is when they fall.
target: 口ほどにもない奴らだった…

source: Fall back! We'll regroup at Wineport!
target: 一時退却！

source: You haven't seen the last of us, scrags!
target: 戦略的な撤退だ…

source: Just try and take the hamlet!
target: 怪我人はいないか？
私たちだけで成功するだろうか

source: There's no turning back now! Go!
target: では、突入するっ！
おー！
これは私が破壊するわ
よろしく
今度は私がやる
任せたわ
ここは私が壊すしかないわね

source: That's strange... Shouldn't one of their leaders be overseeing the dig?
target: 話に聞く指揮官はいないようね

source: What if this is not the main dig site?
target: ここが目的地ではないらしい

source: I wonder how the other units are faring.
target: 他の者たちは無事だろうか…

source: Pipe it down, ladies. There is still equipment to destroy!
target: 道具を壊して、採掘を妨害する！
現れたっ！

source: If we can slay her, the others will fall back!
target: ヤツを倒せばっ…！
目的の指揮官！

source: I can't believe it! We actually did it!
target: 任務達成できるなんて！

source: Who would have thought that three storm privates could defeat a kobold matriarch!?
target: 即時行動したのがよかったのね
助っ人が頑張ってくれたおかげね

source: I told you we should have waited until the main unit arrived...
target: やっぱり無理だったのよ…
応援を待つべきだったのね…

source: I take full responsibility. Your lashes are mine.
target: うかつな判断だった…

source: What are you doing!? What! Are! You! Doing!?
target: おまえ～ら　何して～る！

source: O Lord of Crags, forgive Your lowly servant! I am not worthy! I am not worthy!
target: くっ…計画が狂ってしま～た！

source: Our shiny tools! Who will mend our shiny tools!?
target: 採掘道～具は　われら～の命！

source: An eternity of pain and agony to those who harm our tools!
target: 道具壊し～たヤツ　許さ～ぬ！

source: Do not let the overdwellers escape! We take them before Titan!
target: 侵入者～は　生きて帰す～な！

source: Stop the overdwellers! Stop them! Stop them! Stop them!
target: おまえ～ら　何して～る！？

source: I do not like this one bit...
target: 無理は禁物です

source: If our numbers were only greater...
target: せめて、もう一人いれば…

source: If we are to attack, we must do it before reinforcements arrive.
target: 善は急げよ！

source: We have the element of surprise, but...
target: 速攻すれば、勝機もあるわ
おい、どうしたんだよ…？

source: Here, let me hand you the rei─
target: おぉ、助かるよ！
クエー！
ん！？どうした…
クエッ、クエクエッ！

source: Shhh... Calm down, now. What do you see?
target: おい、おい、何事だ！？
コボルド族かっ…まずいな
クエーッ！！

source: Wait! I thought your leg was─! Damned bird! Get back here or I'll roast you and eat you rare!
target: なんだ、動けるんじゃないか！
危ない所を、ありがとうございます

source: Now, when I get my hands on that 'bo...
target: チョコボは無事かな…

source: I carry nothing! The 'bo has it all!
target: 俺は、なにも持ってないんだ…

source: It's not me you want, it's the 'bo!
target: 荷物はチョコボに積んでたのさ

source: Look at me! Does it look like I have any crates of sun lemons under this tunic!?
target: 隠してないっていってるだろ！

source: Not the face! Not the face!
target: 命だけは助けてくれ…

source: I'll see you in the seventh hell, you bloody coward!
target: チョコボめ…俺を見捨てるとは

source: Who said a 'bo was a man's best friend!?
target: あんなに可愛がってたのに…

source: Your tools, throw them down! Your weapons, throw them down!
target: 命がおしく～ば　持ち物だ～せ

source: Do not hide them from us, overdweller! We can smell them!
target: 隠して～も ムダだ～ぞ！

source: Does the overdweller wish to die like his friends?
target: 死にた～い　ようだ～な？
痛い～目みたいようだ～な？

誰か、助けてください！
娘がさらわれたんです！

「最後の群民」との戦いに向けて
準備をお願いします

source: The rite of sacrifice is about to begin. Mwahahahahaha!
target:
さあ、「救世神ダラガブ」さまへ
生贄をささげる刻を迎えました

source: I always find it amusing how trusting you adventurers are.
target:
こんなに簡単に騙されるなんてね
これぞ、まさに堕落した者の証

source: That is right. It is not I who am to be the sacrifice. It is <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
生贄というのは、私ではない
お前たちだ！！

堕落したお前たちに
生きる価値などない！

source: Are there none who would take up their blade and join us?
target: 腕自慢、腕自慢はおらぬか！

source: Hah hah hah! Then show us the stuff you're made of, adventurer!
target: ほう、頼もしいな…では任せる！

source: As stubborn as a rock, and as hard as a diamond. A formidable foe, that one.
target: やったか…なんとも凄まじき力よ

source: He could've had a place in my unit...if he weren't dead! Hah hah hah!
target: あの者…部下に欲しいくらいだ

source: Well, now we know where the scaled bastard got his name.
target: 無理だったか…！

source: But we'll be ready for him next time.
target: 相手が相手だ、やむなし…だな

source: O great one! An offering of blood and bone I bring thee!
target:
「救世神ダラガブ」さまの
贄となるがいい！！
あわわわ…！？
今助けるッス！
負けちゃ嫌でっす…！

source: We have failed our lord again!
target:
くそっ
またしてもしくじったか！

おのれ冒険者め……
なんと忌々しいことか……

source: The day is far from over...
target:
だが、その命、必ずや
救世神ダラガブさまに捧げよう！

source: Dalamud will yet drink of this one's lifeblood.
target:
この世界に生きる価値があるのは
神に選ばれし民……

source: For we shall see to it personally!
target: 我ら「最後の群民」のみ！
グゥーブーの群れを迎撃する！

source: Hold that bank with your lives!
target: ドラゴンヘッドへは行かせんッ！

source: Where did that damn 'bo get off to?
target: チョコボ…どこ行った…？
おーい、どこ行った！？

source: There you are. What were you thinking, galloping off like that?
target: ここにいたか…ここは危ないぞ

source: Now, to rid me of this wine...wherever this may be.
target: クッ、迷ってしまったようだ

source: I fear the worst for our friend. Watch the bird. I will be back.
target: 引き返す、ここで待っててくれ

source: This place is unsafe. Come on.
target: ここは危険だ、移動しよう

source: We will wait here for our third.
target: ここで少し待ちましょう

source: Jijiroon's had enough peckings and pawings for one day!
target: きょきょきょ、こわこわっちゃ！
ここなら、ニコニコっちゃ
ここで、態勢を整える

source: It appears quiet, but only a fool puts his trust in silence.
target: 警備は薄いが、油断はするな

source: Overdwellers come with food and steel! We take your steel we eat your food!
target: ご飯　武器　ぜん～ぶ出～せ！

source: Serve the Wailers, earn some coin!
target: 鬼哭隊に協力してもらいたい！

source: I sometimes marvel at the resourcefulness of you adventurers!
target: 君の協力に感謝する！

source: This won't nearly be enough... I'd best just toss it into the river.
target: これでは足りぬ…のだろうなぁ

source: Tell the lot to move their arses.
target: 急いで戻るぞ…！
追手がくるやもしれぬからな
ほらァ、さっさと歩けッ！

source: No one keeps the Lord of the Inferno waiting and lives!
target: 焔神より祝福を賜るのだ！
恐れることはない

source: You will soon be one of us, free from all worry!
target: じきに我らは仲間となるのだ
頼む、助けてくれ！

source: If it is money you want, you can have it. Gems? I have more than you can carry! They're all yours!
target: 金なら出す、助けてくれ！
誰か…助けて…

source: I'll do anything you ask! Just free us!
target: お願いよ…ぐすっ

source: I let my guard down for but a moment...but 'twas a moment too long.
target: あたしとしたことが、迂闊！

source: Now, I must find some way to escape these bonds.
target: 何とかして逃げないと…
ドジ踏んだぜ…！

source: Don't tell my unit you saw me here. They'd give me no end of it!
target: こんな姿を仲間に見られたら…
追手が来よったか！

source: Halt and lay down your weapons!
target: そこまでだ、追いついたぞ！

source: Let the captives free and your punishment will be lightened!
target: 誘拐した人々を解放しなさい！

source: I've seen that captive before somewhere...
target: ん、あいつは…？
助けが来たか！
やったわ、これで安心よ！

source: Not yet we aren't... Something tells me those tempered won't give up without a fight.
target: やれやれ、ようやくお出ましかい

source: (My unit! Out of all the units in all the realm, why did it have to be <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> unit?)
target: うげっ、マジにあいつらかよ！
そう簡単に取り戻せると思うな！

source: So you can come over here and slay us like dogs?
target: ぶっ潰してやるゥッ！！

source: There is no truth in the words of the untempered!
target: 応援が来るまで持ちこたえろ！
救出するぞ、突撃だ！

source: Fellow Flames! Give them no quarter!
target: 誘拐犯ども、覚悟なさい！

source: Focus on the tempered! We'll free the rest once the dirty work is done!
target: …今はとにかく、誘拐犯だ！
奴らも捕らえてしまえ！
やらせるもんかよォッ！！

source: Unless we kill them all first!
target: 正義は我らが炎と共にある！
ぎぃやぁぁぁっ！？
た、助けてぇっ、助けてよぉっ！

source: Calm yourselves! Keep your heads down if you want to live!
target: おい、身を隠せ、飛び出すな！

source: Good... My unit is none the wiser!
target: よしよし、バレてないバレてない
大丈夫ですか、皆さん？

source: There may be more tempered headed this way. You'd all best make for Little Ala Mhigo.
target: さあ、今のうちに逃げますよ！

source: You... I'd know those ears anywhere...
target: …なぁ、お前、もしかして…？
た、助かったのか…！
本当によかった…ううっ

source: Might be I join the Flames myself!
target: やるじゃないか、不滅隊も
タスケテクレテ、アリガト…
お、おのぉぉぉれぇぇぇっ！
一旦退くか、もう駄目だ！

source: We will rise again from the ashes!
target: くっ…次の機会には、必ず！

source: Hah hah! Where are your Twelve now!?
target: ふはははっ！我らの勝利だ！

source: Move, scum! There's no one left to save you now!
target: オラァ、キリキリ歩けェッ！！

source: Don't forget the wounded. They are still of some use.
target: …さぁ、仲間にしてあげよう
ば、バカな…こんなことが

source: I will take my own life before becoming one of...one of them!
target: や…やだぁ、助けてぇ…

source: I knew there was a reason I never joined the Flames.
target: 不滅隊のウスノロどもめ！

source: And my unit is none th─ Wait! Who's going to rescue me now!?
target: ふぅ、バレずに…って、助けがっ！

source: We cannot give up now! Where is my linkpearl!?
target: しまった…不覚だ…！

source: Captain, my wounds... I cannot march no further today...
target: くっ、もう一度追撃を！

source: That Lalafell... It was <var 1A 02 /var>him<var 1A 01 /var>, wasn't it!? That fool could have helped us!
target: …やっぱりアイツかよ、バカか？
堕落した者たちよ！

source: I shall rip apart your body as Dalamud gnaws upon your soul!
target: 生贄となるがいい！

source: Bleed! Bleed for the one true lord!
target: さあ、血を流すのだ！

source: The Hound stirs with each drop spilled!
target: 救世神ダラガブさまのために！
後ろに気をつけるんだな！

source: Your defense is full of holes...as soon you will be!
target: 隙だらけだぜ
足元がお留守だぜ！

source: Did you see that? Of course you didn't!
target: 今のはフェイントだ
動くな、この野郎！
おい、そっちに行ったぞ！

source: I've got him! I've got him!
target: 逃げるな、こいつぅっ！
絶対に捕まえろ！

source: And here I thought it was the rabbits who was swift.
target: 意外と機敏なんだよこいつ！

source: Seven hells to purgatory! Another one lost.
target: に、逃げられちまったか…

source: Calm yourself! We'll just find ourselves another one. Come on!
target: ほかにいないか探せ！

source: Keep your ears open and your eyes peeled.
target: いいか、よく探すんだぞ！

source: Somethin' that large cannot hide for long.
target: 1匹でいい、捕まえるぞ！

source: The swarmpoint won't be pleased if we come home with empty hands.
target: これじゃ、親分に怒られる…

source: I can't see a godsdamned thing!
target: でかい奴を探せ、目立つだろう！
そっちにはいないのか！？
出てきてくれよぉ、カメちゃんよぉ

source: I'll see you cut from ear to ear!
target: 邪魔ぁ！こっちは遊びじゃねぇ！！
引っ込んでろボケがぁっ！
亀を捕まえて何が悪い！？
何をしようが勝手だろおっ！？

source: You just wait until we get us a turtle!
target: くそっ、よくも邪魔しやがって

source: You'd best hope our paths don't cross again!
target: そのツラ、覚えたぞっ！
よくも…覚えてろよ畜生っ！

source: Luck was on your side today, outsider, but we'll see about the morrow!
target: 今日はこのくらいにしてやる！
この…クソッタレがぁ！

source: Sleep with one eye open tonight, 'venturer. I'll be comin' for you!
target: 次会ったら、ただじゃおかねぇぞ！

source: Damned outsider went and frightened off all the damned turtles!
target: 今日は…諦めるか…

source: I ain't tellin' the swarmpoint. You tellin' the swarmpoint?
target: だめだ、失敗だ…

source: I can't even remember what we was lookin' for...
target: カメのくせに、ナメやがってよぉ！

source: I ain't tellin' the swarmpoint. You tellin' the swarmpoint?
target: ああ、親分に叱られる…

source: I know a place deeper in the wood. Might be we find us a big one there.
target: 次は、少し場所を変えて探すか

source: What we need is more Redbellies. Let's go back to the Hive.
target: もう少し人手がいるんじゃねぇか？

くっ、グゥ……ッ！
ダラガブさま……！

私の命とともに、ここにいる
すべての者の命を捧げましょう

source: My blood and soul, I give unto thee!
target:
さあ……ヴォイドの魔女よ！
我が肉体を依代にッ！

source: Ah hah hah! Foolish mortal! I know not of this Dalamud, but if he will not partake in this offering, I claim it as my own!
target: オオオオオオ……！
この程度か……

source: Then we shall return on the morrow.
target: 今回はあまり手応えがないな……
あれは…パイアでふっち！？

source: It is! The bane of the elder one lives!
target: 長老の仇、生きていたでふっち！？
おまえなんか死ねばいいふっち！

source: The tusked one must answer for crimes against the elder one!
target: やっつけてやるでふっち！

source: This one cannot forgive! This one cannot forget!
target: なかまのうらみをはらすでふっち！

source: O elder one! Give this one the strength to exact vengeance!
target: 長老の仇だふっち！
これで…終わりふっち…？

source: Yet, why does the heart of this one still feel so empty...?
target: ううっ、パイア…なんでだふっち…
パイア、どこいくふっちー！？

source: Vengeance still burns in this one's heart!
target: ま…待つでふっち！

source: Me poor back cannot take another lashin'.
target: 困った、困った…

source: I'm but a porter. My talents are limited to porting...and little else.
target: ここを進めってのか…

source: I thank you...and my wife thanks you. Or at least she will after tonight! <wink>
target: ありがとよ、助かったぜ

source: Perhaps I can make it back to an inn...
target: 駄目だ、こりゃ…

source: You wait. The wine'll be sweet this season!
target: これで、ブドウは豊作です

source: <sigh> Mayhap the morrow'll bring better luck.
target: そろそろ引き揚げましょうか

source: The golems have the road. We must take it back!
target: ゴーレムを掃討せねばっ！

source: The stone man wakes! The stone man walks!
target: 鉱山で　石像　発掘され～た

source: Save us! Save us from the stone man! Save us!
target: 石像　外に出た～ら　大～変！

source: Back to the mines! Back to the dig!
target: ひとま～ず　鉱山に帰る～ぞ！
うわ～ 石像～が　動き出し～た！

source: No more digging! Much more running!
target: 採掘どころじゃ　ない～ね

source: Titan, save us! Adventurer, save us!
target: ぎゃ～！　たすけ～て！

source: Pshhh! Shhhend the finleshhh ones below!
target: ヒレナシを、水神様へ捧げよ！
水神様と、ひとつに…！

source: O Leviathan! Lend us Your strength!
target: 水神様…お力をっ！

source: Leviathan is the one true god!
target: すべては水神様のために…

source: Gods! There are so many of them!
target: なんて魔物の数だ…すげぇな
おおい、誰か手ェ貸してくれぇ！

source: Grenades! They're too close to the plant!
target: な…何、このグレネードの数！

source: Close the blast doors! Turn off the pumps!
target: 早く駆除しないと…！
また青燐水を狙ったのか！

source: There's just no end to these damned things.
target: しつこい奴らだぜぇ

source: I will not be defeated. Not here! Not by the likes of you!
target: こんなとこじゃ、死ねないっ！

source: We have made it this far...
target: 第一関門は突破したか…

source: ...but our work has only just begun!
target: 本番は次からだ、覚悟はいいか！？

source: And what work is that, sir!?
target: とうにできています！

source: The work we came here for!
target: いい返事だ、しかし油断するな！
ハッ！
目標は「風生みの珠」だ！
ハッ！

source: Gah! To the hells with it! You know what to do!
target: 私たちなら、必ず任務達成できる！
おおーっ！
総員…突撃っ！
やーってやるぜっ！
散開！各員の健闘を祈る！
了解っ！

source: I would not believe it if I had not seen it with mine own eyes.
target: よくやったぞ、もう充分だ！

source: Hah hah! I was made for this!
target: 神勇隊の力を見たか！
…撤退だ、これ以上被害は出せん！
力不足だったか…

source: One-eyed demons to the north! To arms!
target: 敵襲だ、総員迎撃準備ーっ！

source: Don't forget to strip the eyes of the lenses. The Alchemists' Guild'll pay good coin for 'em!
target: 状況終了、これより撤収する！

source: Is there no end to these doblyns!?
target: ま、またドブランなのっ！？

source: If I had a gil for every doblyn I'd slain...I wouldn't be here slaying cursed doblyns!
target: はぁ…いやんなっちゃうわ

source: I will fight the sylphs in a location of mine own choosing!
target: 場所を変える、ここは不利だ！

source: There is no recourse. We must fight!
target: 是非も無し……参るッ！！
いくぜッェ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！
みーんなー　がんばろーねー？
オルァ、出発すっぞォッ！
来てやったぞ、オルァッ！！
オラオラオラ…オルァッ！！
あ？　やる気かゴルァ！？
「チョーシ」くれてンなよ…？

source: I'll show you what it means to wail!
target: 鬼哭隊…ナメてンのか？あぁっ？

source: The rancor! It feeds me, yet consumes me!
target:
怨みが、怨みが、怨みが増すぞォォォ！
この怨みを力に変えるゥゥゥ！

source: Sylphs approaching quickly! Where are my reinforcements!?
target: 誰かいないか、増援を頼む！

source: Imperials in the Twelveswood! I must report back to the Adders' Nest at once!
target:
帝国兵が森の奥に…！
早く双蛇党司令部に連絡を！

グォォォォ！
集エ、我ガ下僕タチ！
隊長、やはり我らも共に！
……また戦えというのか。

source: Is this my fate? To fight an endless war?
target:
見知らぬ世界、見果てぬ時空で……
戦いつづけることが、私の宿命だと？

source: So be it. It won't be the first time I've spit in destiny's eye.
target:
……いいだろう、戦ってやるさ。
神がさだめた宿命だろうが……。
ブッ潰す。
図に乗るな！
そんなものか

source: I'll cut you down to size!
target: 散り果てろ！
その目に焼きつけろ
仕留める！

source: Hm? Why can't I─ Well, this is just great...
target:
なんだ？　手応えが消えて……
いや……消えていくのは、私のほうか。

source: You okay? That was some fight, huh? The name's Lightning. I'm not...from around here.
target:
そっちは無事か？　戦いに巻き込んで悪かったな。
私はライトニング。おまえたちにとっては……異邦人だ。

source: I'm not even sure where “here” is. The last thing I remember, I was sleeping.
target: 永い眠りについていたはずの私が、なぜこんな異界へ……。

source: I don't know if I'm stuck in this world, or if I'll be sent somewhere else...
target:
参ったな、またどこかへ送られるのか。
それとも……ふたたび永遠の眠りにつくのか。
きゃー！

source: What manner of fiend is that!?
target: なんだ、あの魔物は！？
ヤバいぞ、あれは！
ええい、一旦退け！
うかつに近寄るな！

source: We'll try to hold it here!
target: 我々で時間を稼ぐしかないか！？

source: Don't let it come near the city!
target: 街に近寄らせるな！

source: Disengage! You're no match for that thing!
target: 全員さがれ！　相手は殺人兵器だ！

source: You can't fight an armored unit without artillery!
target: 特殊装甲の殺戮機械に、重火器もなく挑むのか！？

source: ...Well, you get full points for bravery.
target:
……そうか、それでも立ち向かうのか。
人々を守る盾になろうという覚悟か。

source: Let's see if I can't help turn the tables.
target: ならば私は、刃になろう！

source: You Eorzeans don't give up, do you?
target: これがエオルゼアの流儀か
バックアップにまわるか？
なかなかやるな

source: What's a militarized behemoth even doing here? Did it stumble through some portal?
target:
ベヒーモス型軍用獣……なぜ、この世界に。
こいつも私のように、異界に「迷い込んだ」のか？

source: Or was it sent after me?
target: ……あるいは私を追って「送り込まれた」のか？

source: No! I'm not done with you yet! Dammit...
target:
くっ……また飛ばされるのか！
みんな、すまない……！
やったぞ！
協力、感謝する！

source: Strange... I didn't expect to be here after the battle was done.
target:
妙だな……戦い終えたのに、引き戻されない。
この世界に、とどまれということか？

source: Might as well take a look around, then.
target:
そうだな、せっかく来たんだ。
旅してみるさ。
誰か、助けてくれ！

source: She can't defeat that abomination alone!
target: 女性が、ひとりで戦ってるんだ！

source: I have to stop meeting people like this. I'm afraid my company's going to get someone killed.
target:
おまえとは、縁があるようだ。
たびたび巻き込んで済まないが、手を貸してくれ！

source: I'm beginning to understand the reason I was sent to this place: I'm being tested.
target:
わかりかけてきた……私がこの世界に流された理由が。
私は魂を試されている。おそらくは「神」によって……。

source: Someone woke me up to see how much fight I had left...
target: 永い眠りからさめて、闘争に臨む覚悟を試されている！
こいつらは私を呼びに来たんだ。

source: They want to drag me back to an ancient, dying world and chain me to a god's will.
target:
混沌に呑まれて滅びゆく、古い世界に帰って……
神の遣いとなって戦えと、そう告げている。

source: Come on! Take me if you can! I will not be a slave!
target:
……いまさら従うものか！
たとえ神の意思だろうが……葬ってやる！

source: Where is this chaos energy coming from? I thought we cut off the source, but it seems to be getting stronger...
target:
どういうことだ？　奴らを倒したのに、
混沌の勢いが止まらない……いや、高まっている？

source: If this keeps up, it will overflow into Eorzea.
target:
このままでは、エオルゼアに混沌が押し寄せる……。
……これは、まさか……奴が来るというのか……！

source: This deity will stop at nothing to bring me back.
target:
……これが「神」の意思か。
私を呼び戻すためなら、手段は選ばないんだな。

source: Even if it means corrupting your world with chaos.
target:
エオルゼアに混沌をふりまいても、かまわないというんだな。
ならば……応えよう。

source: Well, I've seen enough innocents die at the hands of indifferent gods!
target: 人の魂を解き放ち、「神」の思惑に応えてやる！
ゆくぞ、オーディンッ！
オーディン……行ってしまうのか……。

source: With any luck, that'll be the last of them.
target: ……ひとときの夢の終わりか。

source: I don't think we won. Feels more like we were judged...unworthy.
target:
消えた……？
神の気まぐれだとでもいうのか……。
がんばるクポ！
早く行くクポ！
行かなきゃクポ！
待ってクポ～！
敵だクポ！

source: Don't let them hurt me, kupo!
target: 怖いクポ……
早くやっつけるクポ……
助けてクポ……
供物にしてやるクポー！
こんちくしょークポ！
無念クポ…

source: I'm not finished with you yet, kupo!
target: ちょっとこっち来いクポ！
善王様、その裁きをクポ！
切り刻むクポ！
イタタ、イタいクポ！
ばたんクポ…
近づく奴はこうだクポ！
善王様、その裁きをクポ！
突貫するクポー！
一時撤退クポ！
参ったクポ…
モグの大魔法だクポ！
善王様、その裁きをクポ！

source: Yer gonna get it! Right in the bum, kupo!
target: ケツにグッサリだクポ！

source: Ack! Right in me bum, kupo...
target: グッサリやられたクポ！
やられたクポ～

source: Ye can run, but ye can't kupo!
target: 乱れ撃ちだクポーッ！！
善王様、その裁きをクポ！

source: You're in big trouble now, kupo!
target: 火遊びメラメラクポ！
火遊びが過ぎたクポ！

source: I think I need to lie down, kupo...
target: 燃え尽きたクポ～
いいですとモグ！
善王様、その裁きをクポ！

source: Bear witness to the glory of kupo!
target: ポンポンフレアクポ！

source: What to do, what to do...
target: 作戦遂行中クポ…
油断禁物クポ…

source: Ever dance with a moogle in the pale moonlight?
target: モグと踊るクポー！

source: Hmph! Next time won't be so easy!
target: 用事を思い出したクポ！

source: Next next time won't be so easy!
target: もう歌えないクポ…

source: You're in for a treat, kupo!
target: 気合入れるクポーッ！
善王様、その裁きをクポ！

source: Wait, we're doing this now, kupo?
target: ほ、本当に戦うクポ？
た、助けてクポ！
怖いクポ～

source: It'll all be over soon, kupo...
target: 毒沼に溺れろクポ！

source: Hail to the kupo─I mean, king!
target: 善王様…何だっけクポ？

source: You are neither a gentleman nor a zombie!
target: 先生、見ててクダサイ！
練習の邪魔をスルナ！

source: Begone, villain! Leave the Gentle Dead Men in peace!
target: 生きては帰サヌ…

source: The pistol is mightier than the sword!
target: 銃ハ剣ヨリモ強シ！
羽根ナシ風情がッァ！

source: Rend the enemy to shreds, we shall!
target: 我が敵を刻めッェ！
我が敵を潰せッェ！
我が敵を滅ぼせッェ！
ガ、ガルーダ様ッァ！！

ウォォ、オレサマ
カッパー、ヒトリジメェェェ！

source:
Bad men come! Bad men steal!
Bad men die, die, diiiiiiiiie!
target:
ウォォ、ジャマモン
イチャモン、ブッツブース！

source:
All come! All kill!
Kill, kill, kiiiiiiiiill!
target:
ヤロウドモ！
デバン、デスヨー！

source: Byregot's beard! Come to help us fight the giants, have ye?
target:
おぉ、救援か！
巨人と戦うなら協力するぜ！

source: Now let's show these buggers that size don't mean shite!
target:
野郎ども、いくぞ！
採掘師魂を見せるんだ！

source: Momodi! I won't die until I see yer face once more!
target:
モモディさん…
死ぬ前にひと目あなたを…
巨人の始末は頼んだぜ！

source: All in a day's work, eh? Now back to the Quicksand, and the first round's on me!
target:
よーし、野郎ども！
クイックサンドで祝杯だ！
おうさッ！
ヤ、ヤられるぅ！
ヤっちまいな！
ヤるじゃなーい！
た、助けてくれェ！
頼りにしてるぞッ！

source: We live to mine another day!
target: 生きて帰れるぞッ！
も、もうムリでやんす～

source: I can't take much more of this...
target: つ、疲れたでやんす～

source: Nobody told me there would be giants...
target: た、助かったでやんすか？
ウルァー、モエぢまえ！

source: A giant golem! Run for your lives!
target: なんだ、この巨大なゴーレムは！？

source:
Much to your chagrin, the experiment shall now begin!
O～hohohohoho!
target: オーホッホホホ！実験開始ですわ！
やったぞ！

source:
My minion has fallen? Consider me floored.
Oh well, back to the drawing board.
target:
あらあら、あっけないですわ。
これでは物足りませんわね。

source:
I've collected valuable data from all this fighting.
Armed with this knowledge, I shall begin my smiting!
target:
……いいでしょう。
わたくしが、みなさんを見定めてさしあげますわ！
オーホッホッホホホホホ！

source:
Well, what have we here?
You're not half as helpless as you appear.
target: あら、この世界の冒険者も、なかなかやりますわね。

source:
While I'd like nothing more than to stick around and play,
I fear I've more important matters to attend to today.
target:
あなたがたへの興味も尽きませんけど……
わたくし、あまり暇ではございませんの。

source:
After all, I've experiments to conduct, and golems to build.
But we'll meet again...if you can avoid getting yourself killed.
target:
そろそろ次の実験に移らせていただきますわ。
それでは、ごきげんよう！

オホホホホ！
オーッホッホホホホ！

source:
Oh dear, is it already this time of day?
I really must be on my way.
target:
おや、もうこんな時間。
わたくしは、そろそろ失礼させていただきますわ。

source:
Next time we find ourselves warring,
do try to be a little less...boring.
target:
次は、もう少し退屈させないでほしいですわね。
オーッホッホホホホ！

source:
Death by stomping, or death by curse?
You decide which one is worse!
target: オロカですわ～！
オーッホッホホホ！

source:
You can run,
I won't make fun!
target: ナマイキですことよ

source:
<yawn> Could you put up more of a fight?
I'm about to call it a night...
target: あくびが出ますわ

source:
That wasn't wise...
Prepare for a quick demise!
target: わたくし、ぶち切れましたわ。
せいやッ！
うおぉッ！
はぁ、はぁ…
う、うわぁぁぁッ！
し、死にたく…ない…

source: I... I thought I was surely dead.
target: た、助かった…

source: I owe you my life, adventurer.
target: 恩に着る、冒険者よ…

source: Thank the Twelve that you arrived when you did.
target: 助力に感謝する…

source: I can fight no further. Forgive me...
target: すまん、退かせてもらう…

source: I am blessed by the almighty Ifrit!
target: 焔神の加護は無敵ぞ！
貴様なぞ、鎧袖一触なり！

source: I hear the feeble sputtering of your spirit's flames!
target: 弱き者よ、燃えつきるがいい！
おっ、標的、はっけーん！

source: Ah, she purrs like a cat!
target: この稼動音、たまらんねぇ～！

source: Hmph, just a bunch of floating cabbages!
target: フン、骨のねぇ野菜どもだぜ
ぐっ、このヤロウ…

source: Thou shalt pay dearly for thine intrusion!
target: 生殺与奪、汝は滅すのみ！

source: Thy kind are not welcome here!
target: 雲散霧消、ヒトよ去ね！
禍根を断つ！

source: Hope to prevail, featherless ones cannot!
target: 我は朽ちぬッゥ！

source: Garuda's leal servant, you shall become!
target: 信徒にしてくれるわッァ！
諦めよ羽根ナシッィ！

source: No one interrupts the coming of the Lord of Crags!
target: 邪魔はさせーぬ！

source: Your bones will adorn Titan's earthen domain!
target: きかーぬ！きかーぬ！

target:
 まずは、「スピード」を出してみましょう。
　 スピードを出すには、「前進」キーを押しつづけます。

source: Note that your chocobo's stamina will decrease more quickly when accelerating.
target:
 つづいて、競走羽の「体力」について覚えましょう。
　 スピードを出しつづけると、競走羽の体力が次第に減っていきます。

source: Be warned─chocobos pushed too hard will become <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>lathered<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and lose stamina even more quickly!
target:
 競走羽がスピードを出しすぎていると、
　 「体力ゲージ」が点滅して警告を発します。
 次は、競走羽を「左右に移動」させてみましょう。

source: Scattered throughout the course are <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>magicked panels<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> which bestow various effects when triggered.
target:
 コース上に「パネル」が設置されました。
　 コースの各所には、さまざまなパネルが置かれています。

source: Your chocobo gained a temporary burst of speed! However, be warned: not all panels bestow beneficial effects!
target:
 今のは「スピードが上がるパネル」です。
　 悪い効果を受けてしまうパネルもあるので注意しましょう。
