target:
ゆくゆくは、機工房分館や住居になる予定だ！
皆も楽しみにしていてくれ！

source: Today, we'll be finishin' work on the manufactory branch and residence hall!
target:
今回の復興共同作業で、
機工房分館と住居を完成させるぞ！

source: This is what we've been buildin' up towards, so let's give it all we've got!
target: 「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: Let's build something that will stand as a monument to our craftsmanship!
target:
職人たちが誇りを持てるような建築物を、
立派に建ててみせようじゃないか！

source: Look sharp, all of you! It's time to begin concerted works!
target: 復興共同作業の開始だ！

source: House-buildin' is the order of the day, so grab some materials and get to work!
target:
新たな住居の建設のため、
「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: No rest until the streets of Featherfall are lined with stately residences!
target:
さあ、この地区にも、
どんどん住居を建設していくぞッ！

source: Thanks to you, we've all the materials we need, and then some! Time to commence concerted works!
target:
資源が集まったようなんで、
復興共同作業を始めるぜッ！

source: Today we're puttin' the finishing touches on these houses. You know where to find the supplies you need!
target:
作業中の住居の建設を完成させよう！
「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: Show us your skill, and build houses any adventurer'd be happy to call home!
target:
皆の職人技を結集し、
立派な住居を建ててほしい！

source: It's that time again─time to begin concerted works!
target: 復興共同作業の時間だ！

source: Today we'll be workin' on still more houses! You know where to find the supplies you need!
target:
新たな住居の建設のため、
「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: This'll be Featherfall's last set of houses, so let's make 'em our finest yet!
target:
フェザーフォール商業区の住居は、
この家で最後になるぞ！

source: This is it, everyone─the final stage of construction here in Featherfall! No restin' till the job is done!
target:
フェザーフォール商業区の建設は、
今回の復興共同作業で完成する予定だ！

source: Just a bit more work and these houses will be ready for livin' in. You know what needs to be done!
target:
作業中の住居の建設を完成させよう！
「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: This is the last set of houses. I want to see your best work yet!
target:
今期最後の住居建築、
皆の底力を見せてほしい！

source: In today's concerted works, we'll be cleanin' up the Abacus!
target:
今回の復興共同作業から、
アバカス通りの整備だ！

source: That means clearin' away any debris that's blockin' our way!
target: 道をふさぐ「大きな瓦礫」を切り崩す作業を頼む！

source: It's not a pretty job, but just think of the magnificent market that'll be standin' here someday!
target:
皆の力で美しい通りを造り上げる、
最初の一歩だ！

source: Time to get to work again! We need all the hands we can get!
target: 皆、復興共同作業に参加してほしい！

source: Today, we're clearin' away the last little bits of debris that still clutter the Abacus!
target:
今回はアバカス通りの、
「微細な瓦礫片」の清掃を行う！

source: The more thorough we are today, the more work we'll save ourselves in the next stage─so no slackin'!
target:
この仕事を丁寧に仕上げることで、
次の作業へも順調に移行できるはずだ！

source: Thanks to our artisans, we're fully stocked with supplies. Now let's get to work!
target:
職人のおかげで、充分な資材が揃った！
さあ、復興共同作業を開始するぞ！

source: It's time to pave the Abacus! Grab yourselves some supplies and get to it!
target:
アバカス通りの舗装のため、
「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: With all these stairwells, it's not going to be easy─so watch your step!
target:
階段が多い分、
歩きやすいように舗装してほしいッ！

source: This is it, everyone! With just a bit more effort, we'll at long last be finishin' our work on the Abacus!
target:
アバカス通りの復興共同作業は、
今回で大詰めだ！

source: Help yourself to any materials, and let the pavin' begin!
target:
通路に装飾を施すため、
「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: Artisans of Ishgard, I want to see everythin' you've got!
target:
職人たちの技術を、
遺憾なく発揮してほしいッ！

source: Today's task is fixin' up the residence hall we call the Hoarfrost. All together, now!
target:
今回の復興共同作業から、
ホアフロスト官舎の整備だ！

source: You know where to find the supplies, and you know what to do with 'em! Now look alive!
target: 「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: The Hoarfrost is no humble little hovel. We're going to need a steady scaffold to do the job!
target:
ホアフロスト官舎は大がかりな建物だ！
足場を組むぞ！

source: Today we're goin' to continue work on the scaffold for the Hoarfrost!
target:
前回に引き続き、
足場を組む復興共同作業を行うぞ！

source: Take all the materials you need, and let's get to work!
target: 「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてほしい！

source: To scale the heights of the Hoarfrost, our scaffold must reach to the sky!
target:
ホアフロスト官舎建設のため、
高いところまで足場を組んでくれ！

source: I promise you're going to be damned proud of yourself when the Hoarfrost stands in full glory!
target:
ホアフロスト官舎の周囲から、整備を行う！
皆、復興共同作業に参加してくれ！

source: Help yourself to all the materials you need, and don't let up until the work is done!
target: 「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: Remember, the building you're workin' on just may be your future home!
target:
職人たちの憩いの場は、
俺たち自身で造りあげるんだッ！

source: This marks the culmination of all our efforts! Now let's build a residence that'll be the envy of the realm!
target:
今期の復興共同作業は最後になる！
立派な官舎をおっ建てるぞッ！

source: We're this close to finishin' work on the Hoarfrost! This is no time to slack off!
target:
ホアフロスト官舎を完成させよう！
「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: Hear me, artisans? It's time to put the final touches on your masterwork!
target: 職人たちの力、見せつけてやろうぜ！
くっ…！

解放者殿…
どうか力を…！

source: Don't underestimate chocobos! Especially these red ones all the way from Dalmasca!
target:
今度こそ、デッかい戦果を挙げてやるッ！
ダルマスカから連れてきた、コイツでなッ！
クエッ、クエッ、クエーッ！

source: Ha! I'd thought you'd be dead by now! You're stronger than you look!
target:
なかなか、しぶとい戦いぶりじゃないかッ！
いいぜ、気に入ったッ！

source: Why not leave the Resistance and join me instead? Pays well and the grub ain't bad either!
target:
オレの部隊に来ないかッ！？
旨い肉も、たーんと食わせてやるぜッ？

source: You'd try recruiting your enemy in the middle of a battle!? Unbelievable!
target:
解放者殿に言っているのか……？
戦闘中に勧誘とは、フザけた奴め……！
クエェーーーーッ！！

source: And why not? No use in me recruiting you after you're dead!
target:
どおどお！　ええい、この暴れん坊めッ……！
だからこそ、可愛いんだけどなッ！
グエエエッーーーーーー！！

source: Where did that massive chocobo come from!?
target:
ン……なんだ……
こんなデカい赤チョコボ、誰か連れてきたか……？

source: Erk! Better run to fight another day!
target:
な、なんじゃこりゃー！？
ヤバイ、ヤバイ、逃げろ、逃げろ、撤退だッー！

source: It's like the fall of Dalamud all over again! Run for it!
target: まるで、紅い彗……に、逃げろ……！

source: To think it would come to this... Withdraw!
target:
ダメだ、これ以上は持ちこたえられない……！
総員、撤退を……！

source: Hmph! Not so tough after all!
target:
グハハハハ！
どうだ、見たか、オレたちの実力をッ！
クエッ、クエッ、クエーッ！

source:
Basic motor function checks complete.
Now for the defensive mechanisms.
target:
ふむ、自律歩行機能は問題ないようだ……。
次は、装甲防御力の検証に入れ。

source: I knew those Bozjan churls would arrive sooner or later.
target:
ふん……レジスタンスどもが嗅ぎつけたか……
丁度いい、実戦テストに協力してもらうとしよう。

source:
My creation has performed below expectations.
Your assistance was most welcome, Bozjans. Until next time!
target:
チッ……この程度の戦闘で、継戦不能になるとは……
だが、貴重なデータの供出に感謝するぞ、さらばだ……！

source:
They hardly seem worth killing.
Perhaps next time, they will put up more of a fight.
target:
チッ……逃したか……。
だが、実戦テストの結果は良好……生産ラインを整えなければな！

任務完了だ！
協力に感謝する！

source:
Nope, bugger this.
Time to run!
target:
これ以上は無理か…
撤退するッ！

source: The enemy is here, and they've brought their pets!
target:
敵部隊を発見！
魔獣大隊と思われますッ！

source: Let them come. My flames will consume them all!
target:
ほう、魔獣使いか…
我が相手をしてやろう！

source: My beasts will sup on your flesh!
target:
ライアン様ぁ！
勝利を捧げますぅぅ！

source: Without their master, they will fall into disarray!
target:
先に魔獣使いの男を
狙い討つぞッ！
ハッ！

ライアン様ぁ～！
申し訳ございませぬぅぅ！

source: And let that be a lesson, you curs!
target: 我らの勝利ぞッ！

ライアン様ぁ！
この勝利を捧げますぅぅ！

侮りすぎたか…
撤退するッ…！

source: I doubt they'll offer much sport.
target: 歯ごたえのないこと…

source: It must be here. Keep looking!
target: この近辺にあるはずだ！探せ…！

source: Watch out for Bozjans. We can't let them interfere!
target: 周囲の警戒を怠るなよ…！
了解…
指令確認…
実験項目を確認…

source:
That's our opponent!?
Doesn't look like much of a threat to me!
target:
なんだガラクタ集めか！
俺サマも加勢するぜ～ッ！

source: What did I say? We had them beaten from the outset!
target:
ハハハ！
これが俺サマの実力だッ～！

source: So much for the power of magitek, eh?
target: 魔導兵器の破壊を確認！皆、よくやった！

source:
This isn't my idea of a fair fight.
Time to call it a day!
target: このままでは…！総員、撤退を…！

source: Bring me as many parts as you can!
target:
新兵器部材を集めて
持ってきてくれ！

source: Troops, fall back! We'll handle this.
target: ここは私に任せ皆は撤退をッ！

source: You'll have to do better than that, Bozjans!
target: 敵戦力を粉砕した！

source:
That should put them in their place.
All right, everyone. Return to the castrum.
target: よし、引き上げるぞ！

source: Warrior of Darkness! Thank goodness you're here!
target:
闇の戦士殿…！？
いったい、どこから？

source: These phantoms have been appearing out of thin air!
target:
謎の勢力と
交戦中なのであります！

ここらでひとつ
強化させてもらうぜェ？
オラオラ、逃げ惑えッ！

source:
If there's one thing being a beastmaster has taught me,
it's to watch where you step.
target:
そォら！
足元注意ってなァ！

source: Let's see how resilient you really are!
target:
この一撃…
耐えてみせろやァ！
いいですとも！

source: All right, Bozjans. You've got two options.
target:
いよぉ、レジスタンスども！
ふたつの選択肢をくれてやろうじゃないかッ！

source: Die facedown in the dirt, or surrender!
target:
ここで無駄死にするか、おとなしく降伏するか……
とっとと選びやがれッ！
降伏しろッ！

source: You make this look easy, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
グハハハハ！　解放者よ！
なかなかの暴れぶりのようじゃないかッ！

source: I could use someone like you! Why not join me?
target:
だからなぁ、あらためて聞いてやるッ！
オレのところで働く気はないかッ？

source: <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> would never throw in <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> lot with the likes of you!
target:
解放者殿の勧誘…
本気なのか！？

source: Impressive! That was no mean feat!
target:
オウ、オウ、ウチの力自慢を倒すとは、
ますます気に入ったぞッ！
仲間になれッ！

source: I'll even give you the choicest cuts of meat!
target: 肉もらえるぞッ！

source: Oof! Seems I was right about you!
target:
どはッ……なんてキツい一撃だッ……！
やっぱり、オレの目に狂いはなかったぜッ……！

source: I'll win you over, just you see!
target:
ええい、ここまでかッ！
だけどな、オレはまだ諦めてないぞ、解放者ッ！

source: A brute he may be, but he knows talent when he sees it!
target:
厄介な奴に
惚れられたものですな…

source: We can't afford to be waylaid here any longer. Withdraw!
target:
これ以上は危険です……！
みなさん、撤退を……！

source: Ha! We'll let you go for now, but one of these days, you'll fight under my banner!
target:
グハハハハ！　どうだオレたちの強さッ！
解放者、いつでも席を用意して待ってるからなッ！
歓迎するぞッ！
肉もらえるぞッ！

source:
You're too kind!
I'll leave her and the...horse thing...in your care!
target:
協力に感謝する！
護衛を頼んだぞ！

source:
They have found us, it seems.
I shall do my part to protect the monoceros!
target:
クッ……もう追いつかれたの……！？
わ、私も戦います……この子を守ってみせるんだから！

source:
There's the unicorn, and the traitor to boot!
We need the beast alive, which is more than can be said for the girl!
target:
モノセロスと脱走兵を発見した！
奴らを渡すな、処分の許可は下りているッ！

source: We'll show you what happens to deserters!
target: 裏切り者がッ！

source: You thought you could get away, did you?
target: 逃がすものか！

了解！
攻撃を開始する！
ヒィーン！

source: Oh, what's this? A beautiful specimen, fit for inclusion in my menagerie!
target:
嗚呼、よかった、まだ馬肉にはなっていないわよね？
ブリリアントな仔馬ちゃん、いただきにきたわよ！

source: No! You keep your hands off of him, Clarricie!
target:
クラリシー！
あなたには渡さないッ！
追えッ！
囚えろ！

source: We need it alive, but don't be afraid to smack some sense into it!
target:
多少は傷つけても
大丈夫だ！
キュィーン！

source: You lowly wretch! How dare you!
target: 薄汚い裏切り者が…！

source: I'll take this out of your hide!
target:
この屈辱…
忘れるものですか…！

source:
I think that's the last of them.
And yet... No, it must be my mind playing tricks on me.
target:
追っ手は……振り払えたようですね……。
でも、なんだか嫌な気配がするような……！？

source:
Above all, the monoceros is safe.
You have my sincerest thanks.
target:
ともかく、モノセロスを守ることができました。
本当に、ありがとうございます……！
ブル、ブルルルル…

source:
It seems I'm done for...
Run, my dear monoceros! Save yourself!
target:
も、もう……限界……あなただけでも……
逃げて、モノセロス……。
キュイイィィン！

source: Let's see how you like this!
target: 喰らえ！
容赦しないッ！
ウラッ！

source:
I want that unicorn!
Slaughter the rest!
target: やっておしまい！
目障りね！

守るって
約束したんだから！
ヒィーン！

source: Plenty of meat to go around!
target: 肉もらえるぞッ！
ひ、人喰いザメだ！
キャーッ！
逃げろー！
こっちに来ないで！
誰か、助けてー！

source: Is that...? The shark is here! Everyone, to safety!
target:
ムッ……あれは、まさか噂の人喰いザメか！？
皆、逃げるんだ、はやく逃げろッ！

source: Our moment has come! Summon the Bombard!
target:
よし、こうなったらアレの出番だ……！
人工ボンバード、培養開始！

source: A raging inferno is at our beck and call!
target: 任せたぞ、大炎獣の底力を見せてやれッ！
がんばれッ！
いけいけーッ！
そこだッ！
ありがとう…！
助かったわ…！

source: That beat any fireworks I've seen!
target: す、すごい爆発だ…！

source: Don't let up! That monster's not long for this fight!
target:
よし、いい調子だ……！
人食いザメが弱ってきたようだぞ……！

source: A former menace turned savior... This truly has been a day for surprises.
target:
ムッ……まさか、あの技を使おうっていうのか……！
それを使えば、お前は……！
た、助かった…！

source: I'd be a goner if you hadn't shown up!
target:
命拾いしたよ…
ありがとう！
ポッドを射出する！
ああ…光が…見える…
逃さない！！

ターゲット固定…
終わりにする！！

クソッ…
こうなったら！
斬リ刻ム…！
叩キ潰ス…！
薙ギ払ウ…！
強制転移…！

source: May these brave soldiers finally find freedom...in the hereafter.
target:
最期まで勇敢であった兵士たちに、
安らかな眠りあらんことを……。

ユンブ様ッ……！
ボズヤ・レジスタンスが現れました！

source:
Then we've no choice but to fight.
For Gabranth!
target:
これ以上、部下たちの命を奪わせはしません……！
自由のため、ここで朽ち果てなさいッ！

行くぞ！
弔い合戦だ！
ユンブ様に続け！

source:
When will they open their eyes?
Our cause is just!
target:
なぜ、ガブラス様の理想を理解しようとしないのです！
そんなに私たちが憎いのですか……！

source:
We're the ones fighting in the name of freedom!
You're just dogs serving the Garlean oppressors!
target:
ん～、わたしたちは、
祖国を取り戻したいだけなんですよ～？

source: How can you betray your people and give your lives for those tyrants!?
target:
あなた……ガレアン族じゃないですよね～？
属州からの徴用兵ってところですか～？

source:
We serve Gabranth, a man of honor!
He would bring peace and equality for all!
target:
それが何だというのです……！
ガブラス様の下では、種族も性別も関係ありませんッ！

source:
Then what of we Bozjans!?
He would have us all killed to the last man!
target:
でも、こうやって独立したいっていうボズヤの民を、
踏みにじるのはやめないんですよね～？

source: You're wrong! He seeks unity, not division!
target:
ボズヤは、ボズヤ人だけのものではなく、
すべての人を受け入れる「王国楽土」となるべきなのですッ！

お、俺は…
ここで死ぬの…か…？

source: For Dyunbu...I'd die a thousand deaths...
target:
ユンブ様…
私は…貴女を…

source: No! We were supposed to see this through...together!
target: 嗚呼……そんな……私の仲間たちが……！

source: You monsters! I'll never forgive you! Never!
target:
解放を謳う、血に飢えた蛮族ども……！
私は、貴様たちの顔を忘れない……絶対に、絶対にッ！

source: You're just gonna let them get away?
target:
よいのですか…
見逃して…

source: They have their reasons to fight, the same as us.
target:
彼女だって
自由を求めていた…

source: Perhaps there's still a chance for us to see eye to eye.
target:
甘いっていうのは
わかってるけど…

source:
Not bad for a bunch of wand-wavers!
Let's fall back for now!
target:
こ、このままじゃ、ジリ貧です～！
後方で体制を立て直しましょう～！

はぁ…はぁ…
絶対に…負けない…！

source: At this rate, the castrum will be ours before long.
target:
いよいよ、カストルム・ラクスリトレも目前だなッ！
一気に攻め寄せるぞッ！

source: Damned Resistance! This is as far as you go!
target:
レジスタンスが、もうこんなところまで……！
ええい、これ以上、調子に乗らせてたまるものかッ！

source:
So, they've bolstered their ranks with beasts, have they?
No matter, we'll crush them all the same!
target:
魔獣大隊の連中みたいね……！
ブラズ、ヴェリボル、気合い入れていくよッ！

source: Beasts they may be, but they too shall learn to fear Gunnhildr's Blades.
target:
さあ、皆の者……征くぞ！
我らグンヒルドの剣に続け……！

source:
Not you again...
Haven't you already spilled enough blood!?
target:
来たな、血に飢えた蛮族ども……！
死んでいった仲間たちの下へ、送ってやるッ……！

source:
Stand back, lass.
You'll only get in the way.
target:
おい、術士大隊の……ユンブと言ったか？
前に出すぎだ、下がれ！

source:
I'll not take orders from you, churl!
Who are you to deny me my vengeance!?
target:
黙れ……！
復讐の好機、誰であろうと奪わせはしないッ……！

source: You'll pay for what you've done, for the friends you've slain!
target:
よくも、私の仲間たちを……！
皆、自由を信じて戦っていたんだッ……それをッ……！

source:
Revenge will not bring them back.
It will only lead to more suffering.
target:
死した仲間が、復讐を望んでいるのか……？
信念のためにこそ武器をとっていたのではないのか？

source:
What do you know of suffering!?
I'll teach you the meaning of pain!
target:
黙れ、黙れ、黙れッ……！
蛮族が軽々しく、私の仲間の想いを口にするなッ……！

source: It seems we will soon be reunited...
target:
嗚呼…やっと…
皆に逢える…

source:
Ungh! The direct approach isn't working!
We need to fall back and think this through!
target:
畜生ッ……そう簡単に突き崩せないか……！
総崩れになる前に、引き上げるぞッ！

source: The desire for revenge is strong indeed...
target:
復讐心が
戦意を高めたか…

ブラズ、ヴェリボル！
拠点で合流しよう…！

source:
Ah, the Resistance, and not a moment too soon.
Now, you shall face the might of my magitek!
target:
そこまでだ、ボズヤ・レジスタンスの諸君……
我が魔導兵器の威力、しかと味わうがいい！

source:
More worthless toys.
My blade will make short work of them.
target:
新手か……！
だが、ブリキ人形など我が刃で断ち斬ってくれるッ……！

source: You may have gained the upper hand, but my flames yet long to feast on your living flesh!
target:
やれやれ、ここまで押し込まれようなど……
嘆かわしい限りだ。

source: I shall scatter your ash on the wind!
target: しかし、そう簡単にここは抜かせはしませんよ……？

source:
Keep your wits about you, lads.
Old he may be, but this one is not to be underestimated.
target:
あの魔力……あの炎……！
間違いないよ、あいつは「鉄火」のッ……！
怯むなッ！

source:
There is only one thing for it.
Fight fire with fire!
target:
この程度の魔力……
我が魔力で掻き消してくれようぞッ！

source: I hope you've saved a few for me!
target:
おまたせしました～！
わたしたちも加勢しますよ～！

source: Never fear! These paltry foes shall be dashed against my shield!
target:
ハハハッ！
俺サマが来たからには、勝利は確実だぜーッ！

source: My, my. More and more of them are crawling out of the woodwork.
target: 五月蝿い蝿が、数匹増えたところで……！

source: Strength in numbers will not spare them from the inferno!
target: 戦うに値する相手であることを、期待しましょう……。

source:
To die a warrior's death...
Better that than be claimed by old age.
target:
老いたくはないものですな…
失礼しますよ…？

source: I had judged them to be no better than the rank and file, but I was mistaken.
target:
数に頼んだ攻め方とはいえ……
なかなかどうして、やってくれるではありませんか……！

source: Sartauvoir, Albeleo has ordered that we proceed to the next phase!
target:
サルトヴォアール……！
アルビレオ殿から伝達だ、次の段階に移行すると！

source:
Then our excursion is at an end.
Until we next meet, Bozjans.
target:
ふむ……野戦はここまでですか……。
レジスタンスの諸君、また後ほどお会いしましょう……！

source: Hmm... I fear we haven't seen the last of them.
target:
逃げた……？
まだ余力を残してたはずなのに……。

source: Next phase, eh? I don't like the sound of that.
target:
次の段階と言っていたな……。
どうやら、まだまだ気を抜けないようだ……。

source:
Hah! Do not be fooled, my friends. 'Tis merely cowardice!
And now, the path to the castrum lies before us.
target:
ハハハッ！　今は勝利を喜ぼうじゃないかーッ！
敵の本陣は目前なのだからなーッ！

source: My blade... Has it failed me?
target: お、俺サマの剣が……通用しないだとーッ！？

source: Simpleton! Your steel is no match for all-consuming flame!
target:
現実を……敗北を認めたまえ……。
その程度の剣では、我が炎を斬れはしないとね。

source:
Let's fall back for the time being.
It seems we were ill prepared.
target:
て、撤退しましょう～！
生きていれば、また戦う機会だってあります～！

source: Prepare all you like, it will avail you naught.
target:
その時はまた、歓迎してさしあげよう。
次もまた生き残れるかまでは、保証しかねるがね……？

あら、その顔……
どこかで見かけた気がしますわね……？

source: Were you not hired as a dung-sweeper for my menagerie?
target:
ええと……ワタクシのペットちゃんの、
糞掃除に雇った下郎だったかしら……？

source: On second thought, I could never employ such an unsightly creature.
target:
えっ、違う……？
ごめんあそばせ、ワタクシ品性下劣な顔を見慣れてませんの！

source: Perhaps you can provide my pets with suitable sport.
target:
さぁ、優雅なワタクシのペットちゃん！
あのゴミクズたちの頭、片端から噛み砕いてあげなさい！

source: Blaz, Velibor! Looks like we've got our work cut out for us.
target:
ブラズ、ヴェリボル！
手強そうな相手だよ！

source: Do not allow your concentration to lapse even for a moment!
target:
油断するな
ふたりとも！

source: Hmph! A moment is all it'll take to finish this.
target:
わかってるさ！
さっさと倒すぞッ！

source:
Not much of a challenge, are you?
Allow me to put you out of your misery.
target:
ええい、いつまで遊んでいるの……！？
そろそろ本気を見せてやりなさぁーいッ！
魔獣の殺気が増した！？

source: Ha! I'll show them who's fierce!
target: 上等だッ！

source: So far, so good. But it's not over yet!
target:
ブラズ、ヴェリボル！
ここは正念場だねッ！

source: You swine! I'll tear you limb from limb!
target:
嗚呼、ワタクシの
ペットちゃんが…！

source: My beasts will dine on your flesh!
target:
ブチ殺すわよ！
このゴミクズども！

こ、この……ワタクシが……
膝を……膝をつかされた……というの……！？

source: When next we meet, you won't be so lucky!
target:
アンタたち……覚えていなさい！
必ず、新しいペットちゃんの餌にしてやるんだから……！

ブラズ、ヴェリボル！
大勝利だねッ！

source: Indeed, though her beasts almost got the better of us.
target: 手強い魔獣であった…

あのケバいババァを
取り逃しちまったがな…

source: Today is not a good day to die. We withdraw, for now.
target:
無理は禁物…
退くも勇気ぞ！

source: This isn't going so well. Let's regroup!
target:
ブラズ、ヴェリボル！
撤退しようッ！

畜生ッ！
歯がゆいぜッ！

source: If you won't listen to sense, I'll have to beat some into you!
target:
…………聞く耳もたないってかッ！
なら、力づくで聞いてもらうだけだからなッ！
オラオラ、逃げ惑えッ！

source: Let's see how resilient you really are!
target:
この一撃…
耐えてみせろやァ！

了解…
機動プログラム、セット…

私達ノ攻撃を、
回避可能カ検証開始。

アあ…ココロが…
稼働シテいる事が判る。
私達の存在理由ガ…
斬り…キリ…きリ…

了キリ…ヒッ…
ヒひひヒッ…

source: They'd seek to establish a supply point in the middle of a battlefield?
target:
帝国軍め、こんな場所に拠点を築こうとはな……！
我が魔力で粉砕してくれるッ！

source:
Not if I have any say in the matter!
Quickly, destroy those crates!
target:
敵部隊の相手は、我に任せよッ！
お前たちは「帝国軍の整備物資」の破壊を頼むッ！

source:
The Resistance is here already!?
I knew this was a bad idea...
target:
レ、レジスタンスだと！？
総員、迎撃せよ！

source: Cowards! You would depend on machines to fight your battles!?
target:
ハッ……所詮は機械に頼る軟弱者……！
我が魔力の前では、紙クズも同然よッ！

source:
They have us beaten.
We must regroup!
target:
むっ……時間をかけすぎたか……
致し方あるまい、一度、引き上げるぞッ！
応ッ！
ご武運をッ！

source: This'll be over before it's even begun!
target: お任せください！
反逆者どもめ！

source: You shall not interfere with our plans!
target: させるものか！
物資を死守するぞ！

source: I'd no idea they'd be so...stubborn.
target: 破壊しきれなかった…
帝国軍め…
無念…

そこまでだ！
外道め！

なんだぁ…
またコイツらかよ！

source: Hold on, everyone! Help is on the way!
target:
みんな、大丈夫！？
助けに来たよ！
フシャー！
ボアァァ～ン！
フシャ！
ボガガッ！
他愛ないわねぇ…

source: This dance will light a flame in your heart!
target:
フレイムダンスで
鼓舞するんだ！
攻撃にまきこまれるなよ！

source: We need help or we're done for!
target:
支援がなければ
勝利はできないッ！
フシュウウウ！
ボグルァアアア！

ん…？
なんだ、あいつは…！

source: I've never seen such a beast before...
target:
見たことのない魔獣を
連れているぞ！？

source: We'd best report this to Bajsaljen!
target:
バイシャーエン様に
急ぎ報告だ！
ミナギル、ムゥ～！
サイダイ、ムゥ～！

source: So you're one of Lyon's underlings?
target: 貴方が、獣王ライアンの忠実なるしもべですか……。

source: How dare you speak his name!
target:
レジスタンス風情が、ライアン様の名を呼ぶなぁぁ！
汚らわしいぃぃ！
グオオオォォォォ！

source:
Where do you think you're going?
I'll teach you some obediance!
target:
待ちなさい！
さあ、調教の始まりよ！

source: Is this all I am capable of!?
target:
ライアン様ぁ～！
申し訳……申し訳ございませぬぅぅ……！

source: Hernais! Your sacrifice will not be forgotten!
target:
くっ…
エルネイス隊長…！

source: So that was Hernais? A worthy foe.
target:
忠犬のエルネイス……
恐ろしい執念の男でした……。

source: It's no use! We're no match for these fiends!
target:
な、なんという魔獣……
手がつけられない……！

source: I'm sorry sir, but I've no choice but to withdraw!
target:
バイシャーエン様！
一時撤退をッ！

ライアン様ぁ！
この勝利を捧げますぅぅ！
グシャァァァァ！
いけッ！
倒せッ！
その調子ッ！

アハハ♪
待てよ～♪
それっ！
やったわね！
いぇーい！
紅蓮祭を楽しもう！
つかまえてごらんよ！
さあ、遊ぶわよ！
シュルルル…

ミンナマモル…
バ、ク、ハ、ツ、ス、ル～！

source: We'll never see the likes of that Bombard again... Your explosive sacrifice won't soon be forgotten.
target:
ありがとう、人工ボンバード……！
お前の爆発力、決して忘れないからな……！

source: Lyon! It's time to put the skills you taught me to good use!
target:
ライアン様ぁ！
この獣、使いこなして見せますぅぅ！
ゴシャアァァァァッ！
くるぞっ！

帝国の…敵…
倒ス…

source: If I kill just a few more...I can finally go home!
target:
倒して家に…
家に戻ル…！
起動…！
戦闘開始…！

source:
This is test subject VIII, Dabog.
Armaments primed. Initiating extermination.
target:
こちら、被検体VIII号、ダボグ……
火器管制システム起動……敵の排除を実行しまス……！

source:
Wh-What am I doing here?
What have I done!?
target:
う……ううう……頭が……
なんで……オレは……こんなところに……。

source:
This is...test subject VIII, Dabog. Energy levels below minimum.
Combat capabilities severely compromised. Returning to base.
target:
こちら、被験体VIII号、ダボグ……
エネルギーゲインが低下……戦闘継続不可能と判断……。

source:
Enemy targets suppressed.
Returning to base.
target: 作戦行動を中断……これより帰投しまス……。

source: Now to test the efficacy of my alterations...
target: 魔導レイバー、起動……基本性能を検証する！

source:
COMBAT PARAMETERS UPDATED.
DESTRUCTIVE CAPABILITIES INCREASED.
target: “ピピピ……支援兵装……制御接続！”

source:
SYSTEM DAMAGE: 95%.
INITIATING COMBAT ZONE EXTRACTION SEQUENCE...
target:
“損傷率95パーセントヲ突破……
戦闘続行……緊急　離脱……”

source: I shall have to make further improvements.
target: ふむ……やはり、まだ改善の余地はあるか……。

source:
Members of the Resistance, I must thank you for your part in my experiments.
Until next time, my test subjects.
target:
レジスタンスども、献身的な協力に感謝するぞ？
では、またの機会にな……！

source: Data gleaned from such underwhelming test subjects is of no use to me.
target:
ダメだ……この程度の相手では、限界は測れん！
負荷テストは中止……帰投するぞ……！

source:
CLOSE QUARTERS COMBAT DATA LOADED.
INITIATING MASSACRE MODE.
target:
“ピピピ……戦術チップ　読ミ込ミ完了！
サア　殺戮ノ　時間デスヨー！”

source: Now to gauge the resilience of these test subjects.
target:
これより、最終テストを開始する……。
さあ、我が研究の糧となれ、レジスタンスども！

source:
COMBAT PARAMETERS UPDATED.
DESTRUCTIVE CAPABILITIES INCREASED.
target: “ピピピ……追加兵装……制御接続！”

source:
SYSTEM DAMAGE: 95%.
INITIATING COMBAT ZONE EXTRACTION SEQUENCE...
target:
“損傷率95パーセントヲ突破……
戦闘続行……緊急　離脱……”

source:
With a few more modifications, my warmachina will be unstoppable.
Your assistance in the trial was most appreciated, Bozjans.
target:
このデータさえあれば、真の完成は目前……
協力に感謝するぞ……！

source: Such worthless specimens. This has barely scratched the surface of my warmachina's capabilities.
target:
ダメだ……魔導レイバーの限界は、
この程度の戦闘では測れないというのに……！

source: Do <var 1A 02 /var>try<var 1A 01 /var> to stay alive long enough to provide useful data.
target: レジスタンスども、せいぜい粘ってくれよ……？
消シ飛バス…！

source:
Those beasts aren't from around here.
They must belong to the Empire!
target: 魔獣を見つけたぞ！

source: Whatever they are, they're in my way!
target:
俺サマがいれば
勝利は確実だぜ～ッ！

ハハハッ！
いくぞ、野郎ども～ッ！
うおおおっ！

source: With a Blade on our side, we can't lose!
target: グンヒルドの剣に続け！
ゴアアァッ！

source: Such slovenly beasts are no match for me!
target:
ハハハッ！
見たか、俺サマの実力～ッ！

source:
So that's the power of Gunnhildr's Blades...
Just like in the legends!
target:
さっすがグンヒルドの剣！
お見事でした！

source:
Ungh... What drives these fiends!?
The day is lost. Retreat!
target:
こりゃ、旗色が悪いぜ～ッ！
撤退だ、撤退～ッ！

source: Even with a Blade in our ranks, we still lost?
target: グンヒルドの剣がいてくれたのに……！
ゴアアアアッ！！

撤退…
戦線離脱…！

source:
I see imperials!
Let's give them what for!
target:
ブラズ、ヴェリボル！
敵部隊を発見したよッ！

よし！
ブッ潰してやるかッ！
どうしたの？　ブラズ？

source:
I sense a disturbance of some sort.
We should proceed with caution.
target:
嫌な気配だ…
警戒せよ…
う、うわぁっ…！
魔物だと…？

source: What's worse, I don't think these ones are on our side!
target:
友軍の魔獣ではない？
襲ってくるぞ！
な、なんだコイツら！

source: This is the source of the disturbance.
target:
先程の気配の正体は
やはりッ…！

ブラズ、ヴェリボル！
やるよッ！

source: Ha! I barely even broke a sweat!
target:
よっしゃー！
大勝利ッ～！

しかし、あの魔物は
いったい…？

source: The imperials were as surprised by those things as we were.
target:
帝国軍の増援じゃあ
なかったようだがな…

source:
Discretion is the better part of valor.
Withdraw!
target:
危地を脱する…！
退けッ！

ブラズ、ヴェリボル！
後方で合流しよう！
しくじったか…！

source: It's Cassard! And he's brought help from Mord Souq!
target:
カサードに
スークのみんなも…！

source: No small coup to roll that boulder over!
target:
人力であの大岩を…
ありがたい！

source: Look! It's our friends from Mord Souq!
target:
見てください！
モルドスークの方たちが！

source: It's Cassard! And he's brought help from Mord Souq!
target:
カサードに
スークのみんなも…！

source: No small coup to roll that boulder over!
target:
人力であの大岩を…
ありがたい！

source: Our friends have come to our aid!
target:
援護してくれると
言うのか！

マグヌスか…！
助かる！

source: Pleased am I to see that more Talos have been restored.
target:
さらに多くのタロースを
修復したようですね…

source: A Talos? It could only be Magnus!
target:
あのタロース…
マグヌスか！

source: We must go and thank them afterwards!
target:
これが終わったら
お礼に行きましょう…！

これで前に進める！
助かったわ！

あいつら…
やるじゃないか！

source: Thaffe and Jeryk are here too!
target:
サーフさん！
ジェリックさんも…！

source: Thaffe and Jeryk are here too!
target:
サーフさん！
ジェリックさんも…！

あいつら…
やるじゃないか！

source: Whoever you are, you're not stopping us!
target:
誰であろうと
止めさせはしない！

source: This one's aether shines bright. A foe to be reckoned with.
target:
眩い光のエーテル…
なかなかの使い手ね

絶対に負けません！
絶対に…！

source: This one's aether shines bright. A foe to be reckoned with.
target:
眩い光のエーテル…
なかなかの使い手ね

source: Doubtless no ordinary hero whence he doth hail.
target:
元の世界では
一廉の英雄だったのでしょう

助かるよ！
フェオ＝ウル！

フェオ！
助けに来てくれたのね！

source: We would be hard-pressed to find stouter aid.
target:
これ以上ないほど
心強い援軍ね

source: That the king themself should attend...
target:
妖精王の降臨とは
恐れ入ります…

source: That the king themself should attend...
target:
妖精王の降臨とは
恐れ入ります…

source: A portal. Let us see where it leads.
target:
転送魔法ね…
利用させてもらいましょう

source: The Fuath! For once I'm glad to see them!
target:
フーア族か…！
味方となれば心強い！

source: Is this just a dream, or are the Fuath really helping us?
target:
あの妖精侯が協力を…
夢でも見てるのか？

source: 'Tis a strange time indeed when the Fuath lend their aid unconditionally.
target:
取引なくして
水妖侯が力を貸そうとは…

source: 'Tis a strange time indeed when the Fuath lend their aid unconditionally.
target:
取引なくして
水妖侯が力を貸そうとは…

source: Tell me, Urianger... Where <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> you learn that water-walking charm?
target:
お前の水上歩行術…
まさかな…

source: The amaro, too, fight with us!
target:
聡きアマロたちも
共闘してくれるのか！

source: Even the amaro have joined the fray!
target:
ヴォレクドルフの
アマロたちまで…！

ありがとう！
みんな！

source: All of the fae folk, rallying to us... This doth verge upon a miracle.
target:
信じられません…
すべての妖精が私たちに…

source: All of the fae folk, rallying to us... This doth verge upon a miracle.
target:
信じられません…
すべての妖精が私たちに…

source: We owe it to them to see this through!
target:
これが歩んできた旅の結果…
絶対に負けられませんね！

source: We're getting past you one way or another!
target:
悪いけど…
押し通るわよ！

source: Her aether is dark, but within I see a glimmer of radiance.
target:
昏いエーテルの中に
輝く魂の影…

source: Her light... It has a sad tinge to it...
target:
魂が軋むような…
悲しい輝き…

source: Her aether is dark, but within I see a glimmer of radiance.
target:
昏いエーテルの中に
輝く魂の影…

source: Another noble soul reduced to a means to an end...
target:
世界を救わんとする
心を利用するなんて…！

source: You're a godssend, Feo Ul! Thank everyone for us!

妖精たちにもよろしくね！

source: When the king commands, even the forest must obey...

森の木々を従わせる…

source: You have our gratitude, Feo Ul!

このような抜け道が
存在したとは…

source: That such a passage should exist...
target:
このような抜け道が
存在したとは…
一気に駆け抜けるわよ！

source: They're a little rough-hewn, but their hearts are in the right place.

荒削りだけど

なかなかの

お知り合い…
なんですか？

なかなかの
腕前じゃないか！

こっちも
負けてられないわね！

source: Good gods, who in the world punches like that?
target:
なんなの…
あの滅茶苦茶なパンチ…

source: Let's leave them to it and press on!
target:
ここは彼らに任せて
先に進むぞ！

source: Please be safe, all of you!
target:
賞金稼ぎの皆さん
どうかご無事で！

source: Good gods, who in the world punches like that?
target:
なんなの…
あの滅茶苦茶なパンチ…

source: Actually, Sister, when you're angry... Ahem. Never mind.
target:

じ、上等じゃない！
やってやるわよ！

source: Have care─his aether is far denser than the rest!
target:
エーテルの密度が
段違いよ、気をつけて！

source: Seriously? This is a <var 1A 02 /var>real<var 1A 01 /var> person somewhere?
target:
おいおい…あれも

source: Have care─his aether is far denser than the rest!
target:
エーテルの密度が
段違いよ、気をつけて！

source: Whatever the brute's got, I'll bear the brunt of it!
target:
了解だ…
護りは任せてくれ！

やっとレジスタンスを

エルネイス様の無念…

source: What ugly creatures! And their hounds are even worse!
target:
帝国軍ですね～！
迎え撃ちましょう～！

快勝です～！
うおおおおっ！

source: This isn't working! We'll have to withdraw!
target:

source: Cowards! Come back and let our dogs finish the job!

思い知ったか！

やりましたよ！
エルネイス様ッ！

source: Greetings, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>! Can you spare a moment?
target:
敵補給路の寸断に
どうか協力を！

source: I'd best get going. Thanks for all your help!
target:
そろそろ帰還します！
ご協力に感謝しますよ！

source: Not to worry. There'll be other chances, I'm sure!
target:
叩ききれなかったか…
仕方ない、撤退します！
追えッ！
囚えろ！

source: Come to dash yourselves against my magitek, have you?
target: ほう……レジスタンスの増援か……。

source:
Your sacrifice is most welcome.
The data I retrieve will be employed to wreak untold destruction on your pathetic friends!
target:
だが、丁度いい……。
もう少しばかり、実戦データを取得したかったのでね。

source:
Initiate attack formation D.
Now to measure the enemy's resilience to my weaponry.
target:
戦闘制御システム、Dモードに変更……
増援部隊を攻撃せよ！

source:
Most unexpected.
I wonder how they will fare against <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var>?
target:
ふむ……想定以上の抵抗だな。
次なる魔導兵器を投入し、テストを続行しよう……。

source:
How intriguing...
Time to conclude the test and dispose of these specimens.
target:
やってくれる……。
これにてテストは中断、全機出撃、殲滅戦に移行する！

source:
Impossible!
Could I have made a miscalculation?
target:
な、なんだと……我が魔導兵器群が……

source: Ha! Is that all you can muster!?

造作もないッ！

source: It seems these Resistance troops are capable of performing above their estimated combat parameters.
target:
よし……レジスタンス相手の戦闘では、
この程度の無人機で問題がないと実証されたわけだ……。

source: When next we meet, I shall dispose of you once and for all!
target:
この屈辱…
忘れぬぞ…！
オォォォ…
噴き上げろッ！

source: That Lyon fellow is not one to be trifled with...
target:

いけ、いけ～！
やっちまえ～！
気合ですぜッ！
ヒューッ！
みなぎっていこうやァ！
ちょっくら遊んでやるぜェ！

避けちまうだけで
いいのかねェ？

source: Not thinking of running, are you?
target: オラオラ、逃げ惑えッ！

source: Welcome to my secret sanctuary! Make yourself at home, for this time of treasures and tribulations will not soon come to an end!
target:
ようこそ、我が秘密の祭殿へ……！
財宝を巡る終わりなき祭りを愉しもうではありませんか……！

source: Yes, yes, it is time to begin! Shall we have a trifling glamour to liven up this fortuitous meeting?
target:
それでは、さっそく……
少しばかりの幻惑で、この出会いを彩りましょう！

source: Tee hee hee! I'm glad you came to play with me!
target:

避けられるかしら？

source:
Edam ev'uoy ssem a hcus.
Swish-swish-aroo!
target:
ホコリガ、散ッタヨ
サッサカサー

source:

Swish-swish-aroo!
target:
仕事ガ、増エタヨ
サッサカサー

source:

target:
ササット、サクサク
サッサカサー
ガウガウ、ガウ～！

source: Well, well! It seems I've been called into the fray!

source: Bravo, bravo! I see that luck is on your side...for now!

source: Hmmm... How are we to pass?

通路が崩れている
ようですね…
えっ…！？

source: I pray your spirit may at last find rest.
target:
せめて安らかに
眠ってください…

source: Watch your step. I sense something amiss here...
target:

source: I think we are safe. For the moment, at least.

どうやら危険地帯は
抜けたようですね…！

source: Let us see where this portal leads.
target:
この転移装置を
利用してみましょう！
さあ、先に進みましょう！

source: May they find peace in the aetherial sea.

source: These stairs appear to be safe.
target:

安全のようですね…

source: I believe the worst is past. Though there is still no sign of Misija.

突破できたみたいです
あの光は…！？

ココッ！

そうはさせん！
はぁ…はぁ…
くっ…
ダメ…なのか…
さっそく詠唱を始めるわ！
コボルド族を拘束する！

source: In the name of the queen!

source: Those who play are already lost.
target: 侵略者ヲ迎エ討テ！
死ヲ恐レルナ…！

装填完了…

盾ノ型…！

我ガ剣デ…

我ガ盾デ…

source: Know the weight of this burden...

source: Heavy as a feather, yet light as stone.

重キハ軽ク…
軽キハ重ク…

source: I am all and I am none... Who am I?
target: 幻体ヲ紡グ…！

source: Be still, that your death be clean.
target: 我ガ射撃ニ死角ナシ！

連携攻撃…
避ケラレルカ…！

ミナギッ…テ…キタゾッ…
イキ…マス…ヨ…

source: Come, my blades. Defend your queen!
target:
忠義の精兵たちよ…！
我が命に従え！
断ち斬るッ…！
五月蝿いッ…！
喰らえッ…！
斬り刻むッ…！

source: In the name of the queen!
target: 女王陛下ノ為ニ…！
女王陛下、バンザイ…！

source: Hmph. An admirable effort, Bajsaljen, I'll give you that.
target:
チッ…
押されているか…！
邪魔をするな！

思い知れッ！
させない！

source: Yield and we may yet show mercy!

source: My brothers and sisters have suffered enough!

アリゼー、送るよ！
私に魔力を送って！
まだ足りない…もっと魔力を！

source: What's the matter with you!? Fight harder!
target: 何をモタモタしていーる！？
これで終いーだ！

source: Finish them fast! Swiftly, quickly, fast!

source: Release the special unit! Unchain, unleash, release!
target: 例のものを投入するのーだ！

source: We're set with supplies─now it's up to us to put them to good use!
target:
職人方の協力で、物資も十分に集まってきた！
復興共同作業を始めよう！

source: Our work begins in the western Risensong Quarter! Let's clear the rubble so the city can rise again!
target:
まずはリズンソング文化区西の整備だ！
瓦礫を切り崩し、破片の運搬を頼む！

source: I know it's been a while for some of you. Remember: safety always comes first!
target:
久々だからな、
安全にはとくに気をつけるんだぞ！

source: All right! It's time to begin concerted works. Everyone together, now!
target:
よし、復興共同作業開始だッ！
準備はいいかあ！？

source: Our next task is to tidy up the western Risensong Quarter. I want it lookin' spotless!

source: Clean up the fine debris and clear a path to the construction sites!
target:
「微細な瓦礫片」を片付けて、

source: We've an ample supply of materials. Let's get the concerted works underway!

物資は十分だな！

source: It's time to pave the western Risensong Quarter! Help yourselves to supplies from the piles, and let's get to work!

リズンソング文化区西を舗装する！

source: Look at these streets! The task is almost done─don't lose focus till the end!

一帯の整備も大詰めだ！

source: In this round of concerted works, we'll be buildin' residences in the western Risensong Quarter.
target:
今回の復興共同作業から、

source: You'll find all the materials you need in the supply piles. Now let's get building!

新たな住居の建設のため、
「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: I don't want to see a single brick out of place! Can't have a cold draft sneakin' in on a cold winter's night.

家は人の心の拠り所。
その基底部だ、丁寧に作っていこう！

source: For this round of concerted works, we'll be buildin' still more residences.
target:
今回の復興共同作業は、
引き続き住居の建築だ！

source: Time to put the finishin' touches on these houses! All the materials you need are in the supply piles─let's keep it moving!
target:
作業中の住居を完成させよう！
「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: Let's give them houses befittin' a district of class and culture!
target:
文化区の名に恥じない住宅を、
俺たちの手で作ってやろうじゃないか！

source: Supplies, check! All right, everyone─let's get the concerted works off the ground!
target:
よし、物資は問題なしだ！
復興共同作業を始めるぞ！

source: We've got more houses what need buildin'! Help yourself to the supplies, and let's show them what we can do!
target:
新たな住居の建設のため、
「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: As they say, home is where the heart is. Let's give our residents abodes they'll be happy to return to on a cold Ishgardian night!
target:
さあ、この区画にも、
イイ住居を建設していこうッ！

source: All as one, now, everyone! Commence the concerted works!
target: 復興共同作業を開始するッ！

source: These houses are lookin' more livable by the moment! Grab the last batch of supplies and let's finish the job!
target:
作業中の住居を完成させよう！
「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: This is your time to shine, artisans! Don't slack off until the job is done!
target:
職人技術の見せ所だ！
皆、がんばってくれ！

source: Ready, skybuilders? It's time to show what you're made of!
target:
準備はいいか！？
復興共同作業を始めるぞッ！

source: More houses is the order of the day! Now grab some supplies an' start buildin'!
target:
新たな住居の建設のため、
「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: This residence quarter's goin' to be in high demand. Let's build houses people will be proud to call home!
target:
多くの人が住めるよう、
どんどん家を建てていこう！

source: The materials have been assembled, so let's get the concerted works underway!
target:
物資よーし！
皆、復興共同作業を始めるぞ！

source: Just a bit more work, and these houses will be fit for livin'. Keep it up, skybuilders!
target:
作業中の住居を完成させよう！
「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: Once these houses go up, our work in the western Risensong Quarter will be complete! This is no time to slacken off!
target:
このあたりの住居は、今回で一区切りだ！
気張っていこうッ！

source: For today's round of concerted efforts, we'll be gettin' to work on Bright Ballad's Passage.
target:
今回の復興共同作業から、
ここに「詩伯門」を建築していくぞ！

source: Help yourself to the materials you need, and let's get to buildin'!
target: 「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: Let's put up a portal worthy of bein' the gateway between the Firmament and the Pillars!
target:
この先へと繋がる上層のため、
立派な門にしようじゃないか！

source: It's that time again─time for the next round of concerted works! Let's polish up Bright Ballad's Passage to a fine sheen!
target:
皆、復興共同作業だ！
今回で、「詩伯門」を完成させるぞ！

source: You know where to find the supplies, so let's get to it!
target: 「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: With another major portal of entry, the Firmament's sure to be livelier than ever!
target:
ここが開通すれば、
市民の交通の便がよくなるぞ！

source: We commence concerted works in the eastern Risensong Quarter! Let's see those legs and arms moving!
target:
復興共同作業を始めよう！
今回から、リズンソング文化区東に着手する！

source: First order of the day is clearin' out all this debris! Let's get to smashin'!
target:
まずは一帯の整備だ！
「大きな瓦礫」を切り崩す作業を頼む！

source: Combine your efforts an' we'll have this place fit for buildin' in no time!
target: 力を合わせて、この区画も綺麗にしていこう！

source: That'll do! It's time to proceed to the next round of concerted works!
target: よおしッ！　次の復興共同作業に取り掛かるぞ！

source: Our next task is to clean up any leftover specks of fine debris.
target: 今回はリズンソング文化区東の清掃を行う！

source: I want this place lookin' spotless!
target: 「微細な瓦礫片」を片付けてくれ！

source: Good work, skybuilders! We move to the next phase of concerted works!
target: よおしッ！　次の復興共同作業に取り掛かるぞ！

source: Next we'll be paving the main thoroughfare of this part of the district. Help yourself to the supplies and let's get to work!
target:
道の舗装のため、
「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: A house's only as good as its foundation! I don't want to see a single stone out of place!
target:
建築の基盤となる土地だ！
美しく仕上げよう！

source: It's time to raise the walls for a new block of residences. I want to see you working in perfect concert!
target:
さあ、復興共同作業だ！
今回から、建築作業に入るぞ！

source: Now grab yourself some materials from the supply piles, and let's get buildin'!
target:
新たな住居の建設のため、
「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: This is where you put your skills to work! Let's build residences that will keep the residents of Risensong warm on the coldest of nights!
target: 凍えず過ごせる家を、どんどん増やしていこう！

source: Our collectors worked hard to bring us these materials, so let's do our damndest to make sure they don't go to waste!
target:
職人方、物資の納入に感謝する！
さあ、復興共同作業を始めよう！

source: The completion of our task is almost nigh! This is no time to ease up!
target:
作業中の住居を完成させよう！
「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: It's time to show Ishgard─nay, the entire realm─your pride and skill as crafters!
target:
皆の職人技を、
存分に振るってほしい！

source: We've a full inventory of supplies! Time to commence concerted works!
target:
物資は十分！
皆、復興共同作業の時間だ！

source: Next, we've more residences to build! Help yourself to the supplies you need and commence construction!
target:
新たな住居の建設のため、
「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: This will be the last block of residences to grace the Firmament! I want to see your most masterful work yet!
target:
これが蒼天街で建てる最後の家だ！
悔いのないよう、きっちりやろう！

source: The end is in sight, skybuilders! With the completion of this task, our works in the eastern Risensong Quarter will be complete!
target:
リズンソング文化区の家は、
今回の復興共同作業ですべて完成する予定だ！

source: These residences are still just a shell of what they need to be! We've no shortage of supplies, so let's start buildin'!
target:
作業中の住居を完成させよう！
「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: It's up to us to raise houses that any Ishgardian would be proud to live in!
target: 協力して、満足いく家をおっ建てようぜ！

source: All right, everyone! It's time to begin work on Snowsoak Springs, a bathhouse where all Ishgardians can wash their worries away!
target:
さあ、復興共同作業の時間だ！
今回から、スノーソーク浴場を造っていくぞ！

source: What are you waitin' for? You see the supplies, so let's get to workin'!
target: 「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: Just think: a soothin' soak awaits you, too─but not until you're done with your task!
target:
ゆっくり湯に浸かれる憩いの場を、
俺たちの手で造ってやろうぜ！

source: And we're set to go. Let the concerted works begin!
target:
待たせたな！
復興共同作業の開始だッ！

source: Those supplies aren't going to carry themselves. Let's get to work!
target: 「物資集積場」から物資を取って、作業を始めてくれ！

source: Works on Snowsoak Springs have entered the final phase! Ahh, I can just feel the soothin' waters washin' over me!
target:
スノーソーク浴場は、今回で完成だ！
皆、作業が終わったら存分に湯浴みできるぞォッ！

source: We've done it, skybuilders! The restoration effort is all but complete! All that remains is to raise a monument to our efforts!
target:
蒼天街の復興共同作業もいよいよ大詰め……。
